comments: Google Voice no longer works with the latest, official messaging app. Google is forcing us to use the Carrier Number, now. So, this app is no longer properly integrated with the Google ecosystem as it exists in 2020. It's so disappointing that I have to port my decade-old number BACK to the carrier just to use the latest default messaging app. What a mess, so frustrating, but I guess not the worst thing to happen in 2020 :/

I love Google Voice! When COVID-19 closed the schools I was able to keep in touch with my students and their parents without giving away my personal mobile number. I can call and send/receive texts on my phone and my computer. The best part is that I can copy text messages in their entirety and paste them directly into my Parent Contact Log. Indispensable!

Ive been with Gmail and Voice since they were in beta and invitation only. All they've done is improve over time. Always great call quality and its allowed me to always have the same number without caring about delays around porting my number when I've changed my carrier. Its the only number I give out. I never get spam or fraudulent calls. I suppose it's because of all that Google AI special sauce. Keep up the good work!

Works great on my primary mobile device, but will not receive calls on my spare phone. This appears to be a product defect, which limits GV's portability. Looking forward to a fix, which would earn it a full 5-Star rating from me. Update: Developer contacted me and it appears that I missed a key step. My bad. GV now rings through to both my primary, and spare phone. Upgrading to 4 stars. My secondary phone, LG Rebel 4, will vibrate only.

When people call, it goes straight to voice-mail. Even tho I have answered the call. They are leaving a message and I can here them and they can hear me and we both can hear the voice-mail recording but can't stop it. And 3 times I have been in the middle of a conversation with someone and it switches to a completely random person that I didn't call...and the person i did call can still hear our conversation (me and the new person) but we cant hear them. I will never use this service again.

title: Sky Map
description:
Sky Map is a hand-held planetarium for your Android device. Use it to identify stars, planets, nebulae and more. Originally developed as Google Sky Map, it has now been donated and open sourced.

Troubleshooting/FAQ
The Map doesn't move/points in the wrong placeMake sure you haven't switched into manual mode. Does your phone have a compass? If not, Sky Map cannot tell your orientation. Look it up here: http://www.gsmarena.com/ 

Try calibrating your compass by moving it in a figure of 8 motion or as described here: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=k1EPbAapaeI. 

Are there any magnets or metal nearby that might interfere with the compass? 

Try switching off "magnetic correction" (in settings) and see if that is more accurate.

Why is autolocation not supported for my phone?In Android 6 the way permissions work has changed. You need to enable the location permission setting for Sky Map as described here: https://support.google.com/googleplay/answer/6270602?p=app_permissons_m

The Map is jitteryTry adjusting the sensor speed and damping (in settings). We have a better solution coming soon!

Do I need an internet connection? No, but some functions (like entering your location manually) won't work without one. You'll have to use the GPS or enter a latitude and longitude instead.

Can I help test the latest features? Sure! Join our beta testing program and get the latest version. https://play.google.com/apps/testing/com.google.android.stardroid

Find us elsewhere:‚≠ê GitHub:https://github.com/sky-map-team/stardroid
‚≠ê Facebook:https://www.facebook.com/groups/113507592330/
‚≠ê Twitter: http://twitter.com/skymapdevs
descriptionHTML:
Sky Map is a hand-held planetarium for your Android device. Use it to identify stars, planets, nebulae and more. Originally developed as Google Sky Map, it has now been donated and open sourced.

Troubleshooting/FAQ


The Map doesn't move/points in the wrong place

Make sure you haven't switched into manual mode. Does your phone have a compass? If not, Sky Map cannot tell your orientation. Look it up here: http://www.gsmarena.com/

Try calibrating your compass by moving it in a figure of 8 motion or as described here: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=k1EPbAapaeI.

Are there any magnets or metal nearby that might interfere with the compass?

Try switching off "magnetic correction" (in settings) and see if that is more accurate.

Why is autolocation not supported for my phone?

In Android 6 the way permissions work has changed. You need to enable the location permission setting for Sky Map as described here: https://support.google.com/googleplay/answer/6270602?p=app_permissons_m

The Map is jittery

Try adjusting the sensor speed and damping (in settings). We have a better solution coming soon!

Do I need an internet connection?

No, but some functions (like entering your location manually) won't work without one. You'll have to use the GPS or enter a latitude and longitude instead.

Can I help test the latest features?

Sure! Join our beta testing program and get the latest version. https://play.google.com/apps/testing/com.google.android.stardroid

comments: I really like the way Sky map is set up, the options are great, but I have a confusing issue (solved). You were right, Sky map didn't know my lat and long, I played with the settings and it's right on point now, thank you for your help. The constellations seem to be rotated out of alignment. As an example, Cassiopeia should be almost directly over head given where I live and the time of year, but the app reports it on the Northeastern horizon instead, even when I use search.

This app is awesome! I have yet to experience any other like it and I am such a nerd for astronomy anyway and it really helps to learn the constellations and actually ends up being an entertaining and learning experience for anyone but also for children they find it absolutely fascinating and it's been my experience that it opens their mind to science and space. I recommend it hands down way to go Google sky map!

I really enjoy using your app. One suggestion of an option I would like to have, if possible, would be able to select an invisible background. Using the camera field of view as a background would allow the map to be seen as an overlay of what the camera lens is pointed at.

This is fantastic. It gives real time location of the stars and planets. Just hold your phone up to the portion of the sky and you will see that portion on your screen. Point it down, and you will see what is below the horizon. Just be sure your phone has a compass and gyro. Otherwise it will not work.

Bumping it back up to 5 stars now. I updated the app and now I'm able to take screenshot. I did try to email the Devs., but the email was returned as "recipient unreachable". I hope the Devs. see this as google play leaves no way to reply to their reply. Not sure how many stars to give this app after this disappointment. I have had this app for a long time. It's great, until tonight. I saw something really interesting that I'd like to share online but I can't. I can find no way to take a screenshot of the app. Why is that? Is there something that I can change to force it to let me take a screenshot? I have taken screenshots of lots of other apps I have on my phone and this is the first time I have ran across an app that has screenshot capability blocked. What's up with that? If it were not this issue of the app blocking screenshots, I'd give it 5 stars instead of the 3 that I'm giving it now.

title: Hit & Knock down
description:
When you hit the target with a ball, the target knocks down or explodes.
Achieve the stage score to clear then challenge the next level.

[Game modes]
- Ball limit mode: Hit the can, Break dishes, Score target, Hit the fruit 
- Time limit mode: Hit the folder target, Shoot the parachute, Hit the oil drums, Hit the roly-poly toy

[Features]
- Enjoy the various game modes with simple control.
- Various balls supported (baseball ball, bowling bowl, volleyball, soccer ball, billiard ball)
- Challenge mode: the road to the world best record.
- Offline mode supported.
- Multiplayer mode supported.
- 16 languages supported.
- Achievement & leaderboard supported.

Homepage :
https://play.google.com/store/apps/dev?id=4864673505117639552

Facebook : 
https://www.facebook.com/mobirixplayen

YouTube :
https://www.youtube.com/user/mobirix1

comments: A really nice and fun way to pass time! Only wish the balls were more accurate but somehow when you get the hang of it, you know how to throw them. Also, and this has happened more than 3 times, it would say I still have to hit a few more cans but there are no cans left to hit. Please fix this. It's very frustrating esp for the harder levels when you're so close to winning.
There are alot of ads running and is very pathetic.. Its like not playing the game but watching the ads.. As i have downloaded it just to watch the ads. Not Worst but it is more then that..
You guys need to fix the bug I'm on level 91 and everytime I get all the cans down the counter still saying that there are still cans left to knock down and there isn't fix it
Wish games would allow you a bit more play time before requesting a review. So far so good but I'm only on my third level so who knows...
Amazing game overall, fun and entertaining, I will suggest this to you as a quick time killer!

title: Dr.Web Security Space
description:
Complex protection from all kinds of threats for mobile devices, Anti-virus for TV sets, media players, and game consoles based on Android TV.

The product is free for 14 days; after that you need to purchase a commercial license valid for a year or more. 
Use Dr.Web Security Space for Android for free with the purchase of Dr.Web Security Space or Dr.Web Anti-virus for PC/Mac. 


Features and Advantages

‚Ä¢ Quick and full file system scanning; scanning of individual files and folders upon a request.
Real-time scanning of a file system.
Unlocking of data from ransomware Trojans and data safety with no need to pay a ransom to cybercriminals. Even when a phone is fully blocked, even by blockers unknown to the Dr.Web virus databases.
‚Ä¢ Detection of new, unknown malicious programs using the unique Origins Tracing‚Ñ¢ technology. 
‚Ä¢ Moving of detected threats to the quarantine; restoration of files.
Password protection of the Anti-virus settings and access to applications 
Minimal load on the operating system. 
‚Ä¢ Discreet use of battery resources. 
‚Ä¢ Traffic saving due to a small size of the virus database updates.
‚Ä¢ Detailed statistics.
A convenient and informative widget on a device home screen.

URL filter

Restricts access to unwanted Internet resources. 
Blocking of websites that distribute viruses. 
Blocking according to subject categories (drugs, violence, etc.).
White and black lists of websites
Access only to websites from the White list

  Parental Control 

Protects application from an unauthorized access and the Anti-virus settings‚Äîfrom unwanted changes by outsiders and children.

Blocking of access to applications.
Blocking of Dr.Web settings modification.
Password protection  

Security Auditor 

‚Ä¢ Runs diagnostics, exposes security issues and proposes their solutions.

Firewall

Controls network activity of applications.
‚Ä¢ Filtering of external network traffic of applications, that are installed on a device, and system applications‚Äîaccording to a user choice (Wi-Fi, network) and configurable rules (according to IP addresses and/or ports, entire networks, address ranges);
‚Ä¢ Monitoring of current and already transferred traffic‚Äîwith information on addresses/ports connected by applications and on incoming and outgoing traffic;
‚Ä¢ Detailed logs.

Dr.Web Security Space includes only those Dr.Web protection components that comply with Google's policy at any point in time and can be changed by the rights holder to comply with this policy at any point in time, without any obligation to users with regards to changing the components. This set of components is not exhaustive in terms of those the rights holder possesses.  

This app uses the Device Administrator permission.
This app uses Accessibility services.

title: Antistress - relaxation toys
description:
When you need relaxation, diversion or just a moment of distraction enjoy this collection of toys: hear the sound of a bamboo chime, play with wooden boxes, swipe gently your finger in the water, tap buttons, draw with chalks and so on! Are you waiting for something and you need a diversion? Open Antistress app and start playing with a Newton's cradle! Are you furious with someone? Have some relaxation with the never-old fifteen game! Do you need distraction from study? Open Antistress app and choose one among dozens of toys to play!

Take your time and live a moment of diversion. This game include also an antistress Bamboo chime, a finger scale and some dirty windows to clean! 

Plus, this stress relief app is constantly updated with new antistress toys every 2 weeks, to help you calm down your anxiety with always fresh contents, like finger spinner, finger cube, slime and a bunch of anxiety free toys.

summary: Relax your mind and have something to do in boring moments! Have a break!
developerAddress: Bollate (MI), via Mascagni 3
recentChanges: New toy! Kalimba!
comments: This app is wonderfull!! Would rate it 5 out of 5 stars!!! I love it how you gave a try it for ten mins if you watch and ad so people could see if they wanted to buy the premium pack! But, i found a glitch, I was using the try for free (because my parents wouldn't let me buy it;-;) and i was carving the soap. On the last row, when you finished, the soap would glitch through the knife. My apologies my english isn't good, I'm ten and I'm trying my best üòÄ

Highly recommended distraction app! My 2 year old boy loves it. And there's plenty of entertainment for adults too. Really well designed, doesn't come across as an afterthought like some of these apps do. I enjoyed it enough to purchased the add-on content, which is good value. It adds some extra games, a few if which are more involved. There is room for improvement: the games could have more settings and added multiplayer focus. That said, the simplicity is its strength!

This game is great and is really useful for whenever I'm stressed! There's just one problem: on game 56, the stovetop cleaning game, when I'm almost done cleaning the entire surface, there's a tiny bit left. The game accepts it as clean, and this is the opposite of calming! Other than this, the game is highly enjoyable. I also have one suggestion: I think you should be able to favorite a few games for easier access, instead of scrolling through them all. All in all, this is a great game!

Amazing. I struggle to relax but this app can usually help me to calm down after a hard day at school. The graphics are of a great quality, and the sound effects really add to the experience. A particular favourite of mine is the clay simulator, which I would like to have more types of. I hope that one of the developers sees this, because I would love them to know what a great app they have made. Thank you so much ‚ô•Ô∏è.

For those of us who like the challenging and the mundane, these games are either entertaining and crazy obsessive, or relaxing and calm. Great for rainy days, while on lunch break or during time spent in the bathroom. Also perfect for my adult son who has a form of autism and intellectual disabilities. Keeps him busy and focused. Very stimulating, easy and fun. Takes your mind off things when you want it to. Five stars!

title: Pepi Hospital
description:
Step into a PEPI HOSPITAL and become doctor, patient or just a curious explorer! Our new addition to a rich family of PEPI PLAY games offers a vast medical center with tons of items, activities, and ways to play. Join our characters in their workplace, soothe and treat patients, create Your own stories, discover and understand the everyday routines of a busy hospital.

MEET THE PEPI BOT

We're delighted to introduce a medical Pepi Bot, our new character built to accompany little players in our games. Pepi Bot is a cute, versatile friend able to follow you around the building and provide immediate help, to You and Your patients. Armed with the latest tech, Pepi Bot is a perfect sidekick to Your interactive stories. The little droid will provide medical tools and even carry a wardrobe for all those moments when you feel like playing in style!

TONS OF ACTION

Experience the daily life of a hospital full of action - from the small and cozy cafe to a busy pharmacy shop or the operating room, there are various experiences for players to toy with. Ambulance car will arrive regularly with new patients to take care of and new friends to meet. Only the most curious players will be able to find all the ways to treat their patients. This offers an amazing opportunity to set up various scenarios to take part in.

FUN & EDUCATIONAL

Even though the game is dedicated to a young audience, everybody can and should find a way to join in. The game encourages parents to play together and use the games educational values - while your child is discovering the opportunities throughout all 4 floors of the hospital, you can help him by moderating their experiences, creating and going through character stories, explaining the nature and use of items, expanding a child‚Äôs vocabulary and basic medicinal knowledge.  

HUNDREDS OF INTERACTIVE OBJECTS

Enhance your gameplay with hundreds of interactive objects that can be easily transferred through floors. Medical instruments, toys, and even yoga balls can be given to the dwellers of Pepi Hospital for the most unpredictable results. Not to mention many opportunities to dress up your favorite characters!

COLORFUL AND UNIQUE CHARACTERS

PEPI HOSPITAL has a wide variety of characters. Dozens of cute, cheerful and unique humans, pets, monsters, and aliens are there to have fun and join your playful exploration of the Hospital building.

FEATURES

‚Ä¢ Vast medical center packed with tons of items and machines!
‚Ä¢ Multifunctional companion bot.
‚Ä¢ Run your own lab ‚Äî measure blood pressure, perform X-ray scans and much more!
‚Ä¢ Get comfy in a customizable dentist chair. 
‚Ä¢ Become a physical therapist, create your own fitness routines!
‚Ä¢ Be among the first to welcome babies into the world. Weight and take good care of them!
‚Ä¢ Listen to Hospital dwellers talking on the phone. Each in his own unique way!
‚Ä¢ Play with fishes while waiting at the reception.
‚Ä¢ Ambulance regularly delivers new patients.

Like if your like me, you don't mind the ads, but my problem is that I heal the same patients over and again when I come back into the game. But good game overall. I enjoy this game a lot! The one thing is that it kinda boring when you play it more so I given it four stars.

title: Spots Connect
description:
üíñ Play Calming & Relaxing games today and have fun connecting spots.

üíñ Funny connecting games with Anti-stress and Anxiety relief games.

Spots Connect: A beautiful relaxing puzzle game, Launchship Studios presents an immersive connecting 3 spots game for lovers of simple and addictive relaxing puzzle games! Spots Connect offers hours and hours of fun-filled entertainment. It is all about the connection of vibrant colored spots.

In this antistress satisfying games of Match 3, you will have to identify 3 spots of the same color line and connect them in a single move. Spots Connect is the perfect flow game for any puzzle game enthusiasts as it offers numerous levels that are challenging and interesting for players!

A puzzle game with matching 3 gameplay of connecting spots is the best way to enjoy your time. Spots Connect is a relaxing game of Matching 3 props that unveil new quests at every level. Make the most of this adventure and enjoy the line connecting fun!

It is easy to play simple and addictive puzzle! games, yet hard to master. Match 3 or more of the same color spots in one move and make the longest possible line to earn points and unlock awesome power-ups. Solve the match 3 games with puzzles using the best strategy and earn up to 3 stars for completing each level. Collect as many stars as you can and exchange them for rewards! It‚Äôs a relaxing game experience for you and all Match 3 connecting line game lovers.

üëâ Start playing antistress, calming & anxiety relief games with unique puzzles.

Extra in-game challenges:
‚òÖ Glass blocks: Connect the matching dot to dot strategically to break the blocks flow and move to the next level.
‚òÖ Wooden Blocks: Tactically remove the blocks that come in your gameplay and earn a high score.
‚òÖ Black Magic Color Dot: Destroy them quickly, before they generate an additional 2 for 2 blocks.

GAME FEATURES:
‚úî FREE to play.
‚úî Over 4000 awesome levels!
‚úî Stress relief and satisfying gameplay.
‚úî Collect gift boxes and receive power-ups and game boosters at every 15th level.
‚úî Spin the daily wheel to collect diamonds and power-ups.
‚úî 14 beautiful themes - Snow, Beach, Galaxy, Halloween, Christmas and more.
‚úî Simple graphics with bright 2 dot 2 colors flow.
‚úî No Wi-Fi or internet connection required to play.
‚úî Exciting game modes: Timed Play, Limited Moves, and Properties to Collect.
‚úî Compatible with most of the smart-phones and tablets.
‚úî Integrated with Google Play Achievements and Leaderboards.

üëâ Spots Connect is an awesome stress-relief game that you can play without Wi-Fi. Enjoy it wherever you are, even when offline!

From the makers of Birds Pop mania & Pastry Jam, Halloween Witch Connect, Garden Paradise, Candy World Fever games and completely free to play, but there are optional in-app purchases available. It‚Äôs tons of fun your way!

üíñ Looking for anxiety relief & satisfying games for free? Try Spots Connect today. üíñ

comments: This game has a lot of potential but after a while it gets quite boring. Don't you think that when you have the buttons with the stripes an the arrows that if you merge them together you could clear the board or some type of explosion that adds points to your score. Come on people use your imagination we all have one. If I come up with something as simple as the explosions with the straight buttons I'm sure you could come up with something a lot better since you're supposed to be the experts

I've always enjoyed this type of connect games and, to me, this is probably the best one out there. You can spin a wheel once a day for free to win bombs, scissors, ect. to help if needed. Youcan use gems to buy spins and it's very easy to get gems. There's no limit to how many times you can spin the wheel as long as you have gems which is great!Some levels are difficult but you can always get extra time if you watch a 5 to 30 second ad. Try it. It's a great game!

My "go to" game for winding down and chilling out. Rarely do I find myself frustrated, and the ads are tolerable and, quite often, convenient! My teenager laughs at my longevity/commitment.....Level 1141 and climbing! There's just so many spots waiting to be connected!!! ...................... Side note: I usually keep my volume off while I play, but sometimes I thoroughly enjoy listening to the spots ‚òÜ "PoP"!‚òÜ when connected........and the fireworks! ü§£ü§≠ü§ì

I don't like that you run out of gems so fast and that you only get 2 free ones when u watch an ad its just to much work to keep pressing the button and watching ads over and over again just for two gems.. I think we should get more gems and more time on the clock.

Please help! When playing a game, after a few minutes, everything freezes and can't make anymore moves.... do i perhaps need to do an update or something? Love the game and don't want to start from the beginning again. All help will be appreciated Thank you.

title: Words with Friends Classic: Word Puzzle Challenge
description:
Come enjoy The Original Word Play! Grab your mobile device and prove you have what it takes to best your friends and family in this addictive multiplayer game. Whether you need to relax after a long day, or are looking to train your brain, Words With Friends Classic is perfect for you! Make sure to keep your mind sharp as you choose the perfect move on the board, as one word can be the difference between victory and defeat!
Are you looking for a way to build your vocabulary by yourself? Our Solo Challenge is the answer! There is no better way to train your brain than against our fiendish word masters. Looking for new friends with whom to play puzzle games? You can practice your crossword skills with our random opponent matchmaking. No matter if you play with friends old or new, stay connected with our in-game chat, and track your progress with unlockable stats.
Think you're the best at word games of all your friends? Prove it by racking up points and beating your Weekly Challenge!

For more information, see our Terms of Service: https://www.zynga.com/legal/terms-of-service and Privacy Policy: https://www.zynga.com/privacy/policy"

‚ÄúThe game is free to play; however, in-app purchases are available for additional content and in-game currency.‚Äù

comments: Love the game. 30 sec ads after each and every single play is frustrating. Found a way around it. Use it every time. Terminate the game as soon as the ad starts. Starting the game back up only takes 16 seconds! Many games are 15 seconds. Wish the newest similar game was not a constant ad at the top of the list of opponents to play. Tried the new one, did not like it at all! Maybe it is good for the new generations. Came back to this original version even though all kinds of stuff added.

Full page ad after every single move. Every.single.move. Also, there is nothing to keep the screen from going dark during gameplay. You have to manually set it yourself and then reset it when you are done. Also, person with most points doesn't win, so I don't see the need for points at all. First person out of letters wins. So it's really just a game of who can use all their letters first.

Used to be fun and my favorite time passer. Now it's just so overwhelming buggy and full of ads. The developers obviously care nothing about the game play and have become nothing more than money grabbers. I know it's stupid but my own protest is to specifically go out of my way to never buy anything I see in one of these ads here.

The ads freeze so the game must be closed and reopened. This happens after every turn and your version of ad-free is a $10/mo subscription? If there's a cheap, one-time, ad-free purchase....I'm not seeing it. Fix this please. I'd be more than willing to pay a very small one-time fee to just remove ads.

I cannot view the ads to gain more coins, BUT am over run with ads after each move. Some dont finish, so close game. Have repeatedly complained to no effect. Will not buy coins for power ups! People complain about creeps lurking - don't answer them, then when finished game, block them. Turn volume off to block loud music or noise.

Swipe to move the ball and paint - you‚Äôve got to color and paint your way across the AMAZE maze puzzles.

comments: Its a great game, but with a game so simple how come there are so many glitches?? 5 consecutive levels freeze up during a stupid ad to where I have to back out of the game and reopen it! Dont know how much more of that i can stand, fix it or im deleting the game! Revised review! Now its every damn level!! I can't enjoy the game at all now!!!!

I like the game; however, it needs an update desperately. The game keeps freezing up, so you can't move the ball. Then it freezes up my phone where I can't even exit out of the game. I literally can't pass the level I'm on because it freezes up EVERY SINGLE TIME. It doesn't matter what mode you are on either. Sometimes, it takes a few seconds and then all of a sudden, the ball will suddenly shoot around to where you were attempting to move it, but that's rare. Im about to delete the app.

It's okay. I like the game, but theres an add that keeps pooping up, that leaves me to have to completely exit the app and re enter to play the game. Then after I play when I enter the app again, the add pops up after I play one set. The ads are a bit exesive, but other than that, I enjoy playing. It's a good way to pass the time as long as you have patience.

THIS APP IS BROKEN!! First, When You Get a new ball and you try to equip it in the 100's or somethin' you cant equip it because you can't click the Arrows!! I've Washed my phone and it still didnt help. Please fix this app. Plus, the re is impossible levels so you HAVE to watch a add to pass the level. There is repeated levels too. And too many pop up ads so turn it on airplain mode or suffer. This is my honest opinion on the app and it is fun for a puzzle game that's why I rated it two stars..
This game is awesome the problem is that it's too fast and then you get confused where you have to go fix that and you can equip the skin.

title: REAL GUITAR: Virtual Guitar Free
description:
Whether you're already a dab hand, or an axe rookie but have always wanted to learn, this app will help you live the dream! We bring you REAL GUITAR: the best and most comprehensive guitar app on Google Play.

Playing is simplicity itself! REAL GUITAR is an app that transforms your phone / tablet screen into a lifelike simulation of an acoustic or electric guitar.

A fun, light and user-friendly app. Ideal for anyone who wants to study or play guitar without bugging the neighbours or taking up too much space.

You can play chords and pick solos, as well as jam along to music in real time.

Sounds recorded in studio-quality audio.

The library boasts more than 1500 different chords, allowing you to play along to any track you like.

Check out the Real Guitar specs:
- No latency
- Studio-quality audio
- Range of customised chords
- 3 types of acoustic / electric guitars
- 3 playing modes
- 16 loops to jam along with
- More than 1500 chords
- High-fidelity guitar sounds
- Recording mode
- Export your recordings to MP3
- Works with all screen resolutions - Phones & Tablets (HD images)
- Free app
- Easy to use

The app is free but you can remove the ads by purchasing a licence!

Play, strum, pick and pluck to your heart's content with the most comprehensive guitar app on Google Play! Perfect for all kinds of guitarists, professional musicians, amateurs or beginners.

Touch & Play!

comments: Don't get this if you're a guitarist. All of the tones are awful. You can't make your own loops. You can record and play it back and play over that, but you can't loop it. ? Pretty stupid. you can't palm mute. You can't do any harmonics. There is no tremolo bar. There is no vibrato. Theres only like 4 tunings. You can't bend. You really can't do anything. Its basically a piano with a guitar skin. Really terrible for anyone that is a real guitarist looking for an app to simulate a guitar.

Hello nice job guys but can u add more tunnings also harmonics also metal guitar sound also i think it will be cool to add some songs to jam along thank you ,can u guys like install palm mute mode , please can u add some rammstein or soad or motorhead that would be sick ,lastly a personal favorite the power of the horde song thank u good job. Please can u add palm muting and bending techniques or harmonics that would be great

Great app, it could be better if in the chord section you can select which notes, strings and solts play and not be limited for just the chord placement because in the solo section is very hard, any way is the best app and it's totally free and you have access to all chords

I am disappointed with the new update. Because whenever I touch a string on solo mode, a typing-like sound appears after. I hope you will fix it. And also, I hope you will increase the sound volume of the strings.
This app is supposedly part of Google play pass, but it still shows ads when subscribed to Google Play Pass. The app is neat, but that seems a bit shady.

The most satisfying ASMR soap cutting game for antistress. You've seen it in the videos and now you get to slice, cut, and shred some amazing soaps yourself while listening to relaxing sounds and getting a tingling ASMR sensation.

Besides the relaxing sounds and ASMR effect, there‚Äôs nothing more satisfying than getting to slice and shred soap when you‚Äôre feeling stressed, making Soap Cutting the #1 antistress game of the year.
The ultimate satisfaction that comes from slicing and shredding all the different types of soap is unlike anything else! If you‚Äôve never experienced ASMR or soap cutting, just wait - this game is the best antistress tool you could find. So what are you waiting for? Start slicing!
 
 
Game Features:

comments: I absolutly luv this game! It is super satisfying. You get new knife's to cut with, and you find super cool objects inside each soap that you cut. It's so calming! :3 However, one thing i dont like is that if you want to open your "mystery gift" you have to watch an ad. I dunno! maybe thats just my device but otherwise this is such an amazing game! Keep up the great work! :D

Pretty good game after all, but you need minimize the advertising. That's really annoying after each game, there's an ad. And please get rid of the vibrating... This game is played for satisfaction but it clearly annoys me on how much ads and vibrating is. When you are cutting, my phone starts vibrating and it's really unsatisfactory. Kindly make changes..

I LOVE this game, it is so satisfying and fun to do!!! The only thing that I don't really like about the game is just that there is an add after every single round, but then again I don't mind because the adds will give me something to look forward to (the satisfaction) but I would definitely recommend this game üëç‚ô•Ô∏èüëç‚ô•Ô∏è

I love this app, its relaxing and because its offline it can work when you are bored without wifi unlike some games. It's a good app and you should get it because it lives up to expectations, plus you can unlock more soap knives in different styles and colours. Also if you dont have a lot of soap, dont want to ruin it, but you want the same satisfying feeling as other vids well this game is totally for you.

I love this app! It makes a very unsatisfying noise once you are done with a level.And all of the soaps make the same sound when you cut them.But all of the good things about this app make the bad things seem very tiny.I love how satisfying this is!I wish i could soap cut in real life but my parents don't let me.I love all of the different knife types!They are very awesome.I would play this all day!Thank you CrazyGames,I hope you keep making amazing games!Plus, your ASMR slicing game is awesome!

comments: This app is absolutely incredible. It has so many drawing and you can create your own drawing. On my second day I colored 5 drawings already. This app is just fantastic. I always get new awards. However, there are so many adds. Which I do not like. I absolutely hate it. Although, all the adds do remove but you have to pay money. Really good, I was having problems with a other paint by number and it got a little boring so I decided to get this one. This never gets boring for me and has so many puzzles. I also like how it is divided in different genres, it makes it easier to find what I want to do and find specific things that may be hard to see. There is just one problem: I allowed my camera and It still won't let me make custom art, very sad but it's only one problem which I can get from other pixel art apps so it's ok.

Honestly, this game has to be one of my favorite apps in my phone! It just makes me feel so creative and happy. When I'm a little bit sad or maybe just bored, I play this game and it just makes me feel so happy! Also, just to point out, when the other pictures, like, is kinda special, you can just watch an ad and its free! Well, despite the other option which is to get the premium, its fine! So, I am highly reccomending this game to kids, teens, adults, every age!

I absolutely love this game. There are many kinds of drawings to color . I love that the game has different categories to chose from. If you want to color a special drawing it takes 1 add to get it, Well for me it does. I color at least 15 drawings a day. This game is a calming game and a relaxing game. This game is a great game to play in quarantine too. THE END

I love this game, dont get me wrong. Though there is this issue that happens quite a lot when I'm coloring in pictures. I'll be filling/coloring in a picture of something and then there will be a color missing. And I cant find it even when I click the bulb to find it it cant, and then I cant finish the coloring page. title: Bumble ‚Äì Dating, Make New Friends & Business
description:
Welcome to Bumble, the app where women make the first move ü¶∏‚Äç‚ôÄÔ∏è

More than 100 million boos have registered on Bumble to create meaningful relationships, find online friends and make purposeful connections. Bumble is a dating app that allows you to make new connections, whether you‚Äôre looking for a partner in crime, a new friend to complete your group Halloween costume, or to expand your professional network spooky fast. 

Making the first move on Bumble could change your life! 

DISCOVER OUR AMAZING FEATURES
- Top Filters: Find your right date or next BFF and get an unforgettable first online encounter
- SuperSwipe: See someone you really like? Send a SuperSwipe to get their attention
- Spotlight: Get more visibility by putting yourself at the top of the stack for 30 minutes
- Travel: Match with amazing people around the world without leaving your home


CHANGING THE RULES OF THE GAME
Continue to enjoy dating as you‚Äôve always done, finding love or friends is as easy as pie on Bumble, but women always make the first move.

- Bumble is a free dating app to download and use based on respect, equality and inclusion
- On Heterosexual matches, women have 24h to start a chat and men have 24h to respond 
- Other matches have 24h to start a chat or reply before the match expires (We promise that no one turns into a pumpkin after the match expires üéÉ)
- We offer the possibility to meet people in different fields with our 3 modes, Date, BFF and Bizz


WE‚ÄôRE NOT JUST FOR DATING ANYMORE
We‚Äôre the first app that combines the possibility to date, flirt or find your new boyfriend or girlfriend, meet new friends and make professional connections in one single app.

- Use Video Chat to make or respond to a first move and to know your matches better
- Send your videos and favourite pictures while you are chatting with new people
- Hide your profile with the Snooze Mode for as long as you want (you‚Äôll still keep all your matches, because no one likes a ghost üëª)
- Link your Spotify and Instagram account to make friends and get more dates


BOOST YOUR DATES THIS HALLOWEEN WITH PREMIUM
-  See everyone who has right-swiped you (your Beeline)
-  Extend your matches by 24 hours
-  Rematch with expired connections
-  Unlock SuperSwipe, Spotlight and Travel to make the most of your profile


THE BUZZ IS REAL
Bumble is much more than just a dating app, enter the truly inclusive dating community, discover single people who are looking for the same thing as you and find that ideal partner who will make you swoon. This is our commitment to our core values:

- We believe healthy relationships are fundamental to living a productive and positive life.
- We fight against old-fashioned heterosexual relationship habits, women always take the first step. 
- We've reformed the rules of the game to change the dynamics of dating. 



---
Bumble is free to download and use and always will be! However, we also offer an optional subscription package (Bumble Boost) and non-subscription, single and multi-use paid features (BumbleCoins).

https://bumble.com/en/privacy
https://bumble.com/en/terms

comments: Filters don't work at all when you set them (ex height, distance, etc.) After a few swipes, you're not allowed to swipe for the day. This app is annoying and needs to be updated as it has a lot of potential! I don't even know how many right swipes I get! I am told that there are no matches but then when I close the app, and open it in half an hour, then I have more matches. There are so many limitations to the app. I never get notifications on my Android phone even though the settings are fine

I think bumble is terrific. It's best feature is the profiles, which have long been great at encouraging users to build something that says a bit more about them. The quick facts allow a good cross-section of a person, while the questions encourage them to open up without authoring a long profile. The 24 hour limit also applies just enough pressure to give those early conversations momentum, while letting go of connections that weren't quite there, to encourage people to find something stronger.

My dating experience on here is very satisfying, I like how the app works. However, I have issues with receiving notifications, even when turning off battery saver or putting high priority from my phone settings. And also, please PLEASE don't send a notification to all my matches when my snooze is over, or at least let me choose whether I want to send the notification or not. It's very embarrassing for me.

80% of my matches never send that first message and when you do get one and reply, its like they deleted the app altogether. Basically any match will most likely waste your time and thoughts. The app would make more sense if it was called "dream crusher" or "crush crusher". And the truth is girls are even worse at messaging first so youre system right now just doesnt work!! And not worth a penny.

Account blocked for no reason given!!...avoid this app at all costs. I've had zero success on this app since April 2020 in comparison to others. I refuse to pay for any dating service long term and I've used the premium once. I went to check this morning and my account is blocked. There are no options to appeal nor are there any options to contact for the reason in doing so. Does the 'freedom of information act' not permit you to share with me the reasons for this action to be taken?

title: Design Home: Play + Save
description:
Looking for a new creative hobby? Play Design Home today - a relaxing, fun game that allows you to live the life of an interior decorator. Sharpen your decorating skills in daily Design Challenges and style visually stunning three-dimensional spaces with access to real, high-end furniture and decor brands. Unlock 'My Homes' to access bathrooms, kitchens and more customization options to bring your dream homes to life! It‚Äôs quick, it‚Äôs fun and you can connect with a vibrant creative community while learning about diverse d√©cor styles - thus improving your design skills and gaining inspiration that you can even apply in your real life.

* Relax through play and express your creativity in daily Design Challenges.
* Unlock rewards as you polish your amazing abilities as an interior decorator.
* Level up to access 'My Homes' - with dream homes of your very own to design as you wish!
* Play with real life, high-end brands as you learn about different interior design styles.
* Vote on your favorite rooms from a vibrant, creative community.
* Share your creativity and borrow furnishings from your friends when you connect to Facebook.

With new pieces added every day, Design Home lets you play with home furnishings from real-life brands - all available directly at your fingertips. Not only can you discover brands and trends, you can get inspired and build your interior decorating skills! 

PLEASE NOTE:
- This game is free to play, but you can choose to pay real money for some extra items, which will charge your Google account. You can disable in-app purchasing by adjusting your device settings.
- This game is not intended for children.
- Please buy carefully.
- Advertising appears in this game.
- This game may permit users to interact with one another (e.g., chat rooms, player to player chat, messaging) depending on the availability of these features. Linking to social networking sites are not intended for persons in violation of the applicable rules of such social networking sites.
- A network connection is required to play.
- For information about how Glu collects and uses your data, please read our privacy policy at: www.Glu.com/privacy
- If you have a problem with this game, please use the game‚Äôs ‚ÄúHelp‚Äù feature.

Terms of Service: http://www.glu.com/terms
Privacy Policy: http://www.glu.com/privacy

comments: I really love this game, it is addictive. I recommend a few changes or I need to back away from playing. To decorate the way you'd like, it cost too much money. I think once you've earned an item it should be yours to keep. You only get to use it 5 times then you have to keep re-purchasing. Also, the "My Homes" doesn't keep up with your pace, you can only collect 50 keys then you just lose them. I wish when going through items to purchase you could sort by price. 5 stars down to 3, sorry!

I absolutely like this game. The designs and inventory are pretty. I like the fact that they give you diamonds every day and have a chance to earn money on a design with out having to spend any money. This comment was when I first started playing the game. I have been p!aying for a few months now and I sense the frustration as others do about the voting process. It really needs to be rethought. It is not fair and gives stars when not due and no stars when due. People see differently!

Love this app, but I would love some real review so I can learn how to.get the 5.0 scores all the time. Also, the app expects you to buy too much all the time with what is required. It makes it hard to just play in the app. We need more daily challenges. Update: I really like this app but it is so hard to do more than 1 challenge because everything costs so much in diamonds. Too expensive.

Design home is my daily stress reliever. Although I love this game, I have to say that it is always taking forever to load and it is not my connection though it says I have a bad connection. For the few years I have been playing it I haven't complained but I'm at level 51 and just trying to load an option takes forever and sometimes I'm told item can't be found right nowü§∑üèª‚Äç‚ôÄÔ∏è. It's a little frustrating but still absolutely love this game. Please let me know if there is a way to improve this?

Game is great.. expensive if you want to keep up...but it never ever connects for me the 1st time . and it's not my interent it's your server...One time I have to use my interent then I have to use my data..and most times I have to go back and forth 3 or 4 times to see which it will take...and this is every single day a few times a day .it never is the same and takes forever to load when it finally gets working.. but I do love the game! I am addicted just wish you would fix those 2 things...

title: EMERGENCY HQ - free rescue strategy game
description:
The new game in the EMERGENCY series - download the rescue simulator EMERGENCY HQ now!

EMERGENCY HQ is a rescue simulation game. Take control of emergency units, including fire and ambulance, police, SWAT and technical services. Head up operations of rescues, crimes, medical and catastrophe management, dispatch and command vehicles and personnel.
Control firefighters, EMTs, paramedics, doctors, police officers and special forces to fight fires, rescue animals, save lives, fight terrorists and much more. Build up your base and put together the perfect emergency services team! Upgrade your fire trucks, hospital, other buildings and units, expand your headquarters. Use the Fire Department, Rescue Service, Police Department, and Technical Units to master the many exciting and challenging missions!

Join forces in a rescue alliance and support friends in challenging missions. 

Do you have what it takes to be a hero? Fight The Chaos! Play the top firefighter game now!

EMERGENCY HQ - the fire fighter and rescue simulator game - is free to download and play, however some game items can also be purchased for real money. If you don‚Äôt want to use these features, please disable in-app purchases in your device settings.

comments: I've played this game before, and I love it. But now that I've reinstalled it, it isn't loading. Every time it gets to, let's say, 93%, it crashes and takes me back to my phone's home screen. Then I have to restart the game only to see it crash again. I'm going to give it 4 stars once this bug is fixed, but until then it's going to be 2 stars. I love this game, but please fix all the bugs.

The main qualm i have with this game is how expensive all of the buildings are. I played this game for the longest time and stopped. Now I remember why. Buildings are way too expensive and im having to use gems to skip missions that I cant do becuase I dont have the right units. It's either a time consuming grind or spending real money.

Been playing for a few days and i am really enjoying this game, it seems to be more than fair so its not forcing me into making payments i dont want to make ect, there NO forced ads which is amazing too say. The gameplay is smooth and fun. The missions are repeated sometimes but hey, more money, xp and the 3rd time round its all 3x. Its nice to see a committed and fair developer. Thank You üëåüëçüíô

There is no new exciting things and the game is become boring for me. Earning of coins is low and vehicle call cost is high and upgrade charges are too high. Connecting issue even i am connected to a high speed wifi. Every day 3 to 4 missions i have to skip by using 5 emerald because my base is not enough to complete those missions then why it is showing to me. Earning of emerald is too low per day according to its experience. No new events.

I actually like this game but, from 4 star, I made it 2 star. Since you didnt do anything abt this "CONNECTION ERROR" problem sht. In this game, "BUILDINGS ARE EXPENSIVE". So everytime that connection problem appear, I lost the money i spent for the units. FIX IT THIS TIME. PLEASE... I think every player has the same problem. Atleast return the money back.

title: Kids Doodle - Color & Draw Free Game
description:
Kids Doodle, the BEST android drawing app for kids!

Kids Doodle is particularly designed for kids with super easy-to-use painting on photo or canvas. 

It has endless bright colors and 24 beautiful brushes, such as glow, neon, rainbow, crayon and sketchy, etc.

App supports unique "movie" mode, which can play back kid's artwork like a small film. Children love it so much!

title: LG Health
description:
LG Health tracks your activity levels and provides an interface and related content based on that information, so all types of users can customize the app to fit their own activity levels. 

Beginner
You can see beginner exercise info when exercise is not part of your daily routine. The exercise circle shows the progress to your goal over 24 hours. Tap the circle to see the type of exercises you have done.	

Advanced
You can see advanced exercise info when exercise is part of your daily routine. The exercise circle shows the progress to your goal over 24 hours by type and intensity. Tap the circle to see your weekly exercise trends in a graph. You can also add logs manually.	

Tips‚Ä®
You can see personalized tips above the exercise circle. Tips are shown according to your lifestyle and exercise patterns.

Accessory
Manage your fitness activities, track your weight and monitor your diet using LG Smart Watch and Tone Active.

Conditions
The App supports all LG smartphones and includes Non-LG Android smartphones as well.
Tablets and some mobile devices may not be supported. Some functions may not be available based on regions/service providers/devices. LG Health requires Android OS 4.4 or above. Please note that LG Health is intended for fitness and wellness purposes only and is not intended for use in the diagnosis of disease or other conditions, or in the cure, mitigation, treatment, or prevention of disease.

summary: You can see your daily exercise info with tips and challenges.
recentChanges:
* From the Android 10, need to update and re-login for LG Health service(Ranking and sync).
* According to Google policies, From the Oreo OS(Android 8.0), LG Health app alerts are always displayed in the notification window.
You can setting app notifications by touching and holding the notification.
Turning off notifications may limit some features.
* Activity recognition of cycling and climbing stairs are no longer supported.
* Does not support login with Amazon account.
comments: This is an applicable widget, but I found a shortage on it. For example, during daily activity, while I'm in the car, the widget is still counting my steps, while I'm not walking. So I suggest you to put some useful keys on the widget i.e. play/pause/stop, in order to use this application just during exercise or at the time that we need do some activites.

The app needs to allow for the customer to be able to add the information on the types of exercises even if it the day after. This app does not allow to add information if you forgot to do it on the specific day. Also is too light. They need to af more features.
Very accurate step count. Within 25 inches. Lousy complicatef UI.

You should be able to choose whether or not you want to have this app on you phone. There should be a sign in option as well. If you want to erase the data you've entered that should be an option as well. Nowadays people are using their smartwatches to track their fitness. Stop prompting me to update an app I don't want to use, it's taking up space.

Please increase the font size and contrast of info on the widget. There is plenty of room for a larger font. The white letters against the gray background make it even harder to read. Also the number of steps is unreadable in both colors because of the font and the bright colors. Thank you.

title: Pinkfong Baby Shark
description:
The official app for "PINKFONG BABY SHARK" is back with new videos and games!
 
Listen to the kids' most popular dance song, "Baby Shark," play fun card & puzzle games, enjoy coloring activities and learn animal names! 

Features:

1. Watch videos offline
- Watch Baby Shark in various versions, including: Original Baby Shark Dance, Baby Shark 3D ver., Baby Shark Halloween, and more! 
- Available in 7 languages: English, Korean, Chinese, Japanese, Spanish, Portuguese, and Russian.
- You can watch them offline after you download them first.

2. Color your favorite character
- Choose your favorite theme and color your favorite characters, including Baby Shark and Pinkfong. 
- Use different art tools, including 12 colorful crayons,12 glitters and cute stickers.

3. Play music with fun instruments
- Use different tunes to play music with the fish, clams, and jellyfish!
- Includes 4 different play modes.
- Be creative & make your own music!

4. Learn sea animal names 
- Pop the bubbles to learn the names of different animals in various languages!
- Listen to the funny sounds whenever you pop the bubbles.

5. Match pictures with cards
- Flip and match the cards and learn the different animal names.
- Meet new friends every time you restart the game.

6. (NEW) Fun Interactive Games
- Baby Shark Race: Choose your favorite sea animal character and run to win the race!
- Grandpa Shark's Buns: Help Grandpa Shark organize his hot clam buns!


Have FUN with Baby Shark! 

*** Permission required to access your device's external storage for saving and loading photos.

comments: After 7 October the game almost unusable. When I open it without internet it stucks in a initial screen. I turn on internet it launches the normal screen. After 10 minutes I watch this for 20 minutes then it makes my tablet unresponsive for 50 seconds. This is a issue on my tablet.

title: Verizon Call Filter
description:
Your phone is your door to the world, and you shouldn't open it for just anyone. With Call Filter, you can screen incoming calls, auto-block spam and report any unwanted numbers. Or, upgrade to Call Filter Plus with Caller ID for added security. Put a name to the unknown numbers, make your own personal block list, and even assess the risk level of incoming calls. Enroll today and start answering with confidence.

 

Key Features:

‚Ä¢ Get real-time alerts on your incoming call screen so you can better avoid spam calls

‚Ä¢ Automatically send spam callers to voicemail with the spam filter

‚Ä¢ Report a number as spam so you can help improve our algorithm

‚Ä¢ See each spam call‚Äôs level of risk so that you can learn more about the caller

‚Ä¢ Manage other unwanted calls with a personal spam and block list

‚Ä¢ Block all incoming calls from international numbers

‚Ä¢ Search our spam database to see if a number has already been identified as spam

‚Ä¢ Identify unknown numbers by name on the incoming call screen, call log and eligible messaging apps, even if the caller is not saved to your contacts

‚Ä¢ Seamlessly update your contacts with newly identified numbers

 

Eligible customers get a 10-day trial of Call Filter Plus. Customers can choose to enroll in Call Filter to get just the basics (spam detection, blocking and reporting) for free, or subscribe to Call Filter Plus for all that and more for $2.99 per month, per line. Accounts with 3 or more eligible lines can subscribe to Call Filter Plus (Multi-line) for $7.99/mo by logging in to My Verizon. If you choose to enroll in Call Filter or Call Filter Plus via the app, the spam filter will be automatically set to block high-risk spam callers, but you can change your block settings at any time. Data charges apply.

 

Please reference https://www.vzw.com/support/how-to-use-call-filter/ and https://www.vzw.com/support/call-filter-faqs/ for step-by-step instructions on how to use the app and answers to frequently asked questions. For additional details on Call Filter and Call Filter Plus, please see https://www.verizonwireless.com/solutions-and-services/call-filter/.

comments: Absolutely the worst...DOES NOT filter the "unknown name" calls which are usually spoofed numbers anyway, and are scammers, even though there is a feature to filter "unknown name" calls....IT DOES NOT WORK!!! Verizon and all of the other cell service providers have yet to figure this s**t out, yet expect YOU to pay your f***ing bill every month. PISS POOR SERVICE!!!

This app is horrible, If I could give it Zero stars I would. I pay every month to use this app, but blocked calls still continue to come through, I get the notifications of the blocked calls, and they are able to leave voice mails. Every time this app updates it gets worse. All the damn money I pay a month for the service would think it would be a little but better but no Verizon is rip offs! This app was great until 10 updates ago, now it's junk! If it ain't broken, don't fix it!

Piece of Junk. The thing is enabled and I still get calls daily saying I won a free stay at a Marriott hotel. This call comes from a different number every day so blocking one number (on my phone) doesn't help so I thought this app would do a better job. I'd have better luck teaching my dog long division.

I seem to get more spam calls since they implemented this than i did before it existed. Half the time, calls marked "possible spam" are my actual health insurance trying to contact me. Worst part is, they charge for a version they claim is better. Anyone risking money on this app has lost their minds!! Blocking spam calls/texts should be the DUTY of the provider; NOT a service they charge extra for.

this app works okay but it doesn't truly block calls they will burp in to let me know I'm getting a block call that certainly defeats the purpose of blocking the calls. It also allows the block calls to leave voice messages. Unknown calls and restricted calls should automatically be blocked but they aren't. Calls it do not ID the callers should be blocked also automatically.

title: Happy Color‚Ñ¢ ‚Äì Color by Number
description:
EXCLUSIVE PICS! Color your favorite pics
and discover new DISNEY category!

Happy Color‚Ñ¢ is a color by number game for adults. There are so many colorful, breathtaking pictures to color!

All 4000 of them are free. We have a great number of categories in our paint by number app:
-  Animals. Just find the cutest buddy you want to color; 
-  Places. Find pictures of the real places and unique buildings beautifully painted in our coloring book;
-  Hobbies like sports, music, board games, puzzles and other coloring pages;
-  Flowers. The most beautiful and exotic flowers are already painted. 

All you need to do is to color them in our coloring by number book!

And this is only a small part of the pictures we have in Happy Color. Open the game and you will find people, mosaic, mandala, horoscopes, fantasy, art and many more coloring pages.

Coloring has never been so easy, all pictures are marked by numbers. Open your color by number book and rediscover the simple relaxation and joy of coloring. Paint and share your favorite adult coloring pages with friends and family, let everyone see your fantastic coloring pages!

Color your life with our adult coloring book Happy Color!

We are constantly working to make our coloring book better, please, share your feedbacks: support@x-flow.app

comments: Nice way to relax. It does have a LOT of ads, but when you consider just how much free stuff you get (4-8 new pictures each day), it balances out. Still a bit annoying, but can be mostly overlooked. I would also like to add that it would be great to search the images for something specific, ie: landscapes, horses, etc.

After trying many paint by number games, this particular one is the most enjoyable and easy to use. Yes, there are ads but i just mute them. So many detailed quality pictures with rich colors- The fine art section is my favorite. Especially during this covid19 virus, this is a very therapeutic way to spend some time. Peace and good health to all :)

The amount of ads you have in your app and how often they show up is ridiculous. I get greeted by an ad when I start the app on my phone makes it seem like you're too desperate for people to watch your ads. Also, on many pictures there's the smallest most insignificant area hidden that you have to color, this game is supposed to be relaxing but having that doesn't help people relax.

I love this game! It's super fun and stress relieving. There are some problems I have with it such as crashing or not being able to claim achievements, and one of the Pisces pictures has the cancer symbol on it rather than the Pisces one. Other than that I say this game is awesome and I would recommend it to anyone and everyone!

It's pretty decent. You can save your progress and continue on other devices if you connect it to your facebook. There are a lot of ads if you don't pay to remove them but on the bright side it is a one time payment. You never have to worry about running out of pictures because there are constantly more being added on top of the countless ones that are already on there.

title: Barbie Dreamhouse Adventures
description:
Create your very own Barbie Dreamhouse experience! You can design every room. Meet my BFFs and puppies! Join us for a bunch of fun activities: baking, dancing or epic pool parties! Plus, dress me and my friends up in fashion-forward looks to get picture ready! Follow us on exciting adventures in the Dreamhouse where anything is possible!

LET‚ÄôS MOVE IN
Help me design every room with wonderful wallpapers and dazzling decorations. Make it your own Dreamhouse! Ready, set, style! 

THE COOLEST FRIENDS
Meet my best friends: Renee, a sports fanatic; Daisy, a talented DJ; Teresa, a science-lover; Nikki, an aspiring fashion designer and the one-and-only Ken. Plus, my fun-loving sisters: Skipper, Stacie and Chelsea!

NEW DRESS ALERT
I just got this new dress and I‚Äôm so excited to wear it at tonight‚Äôs party. I need your fabulous fashion tips to pick the perfect look! 

SELFIE, ANYONE?
Get your funny poses ready in the photobooth with Nikki and Teresa!

SUMMER TIME
Wait, what?! Ken is hosting one of his legendary pool parties! Let‚Äôs change into summer attire to make a splash entrance! 

FOODIES
I love cooking! Why don‚Äôt you join me in my awesome kitchen? 

ROCK OUT
Grab your favorite instrument to rock out in our band! Even the puppies can sing! 

DANCE, DANCE
Did someone say dance-off? Time to show our best moves on the dancefloor with Daisy!

SUBSCRIPTION DETAILS
- This app offers monthly subscriptions
- Users may be offered a free trial of the subscription 
- One free trial per Google account on new subscriptions only 
- Users will need to opt-in to a subscription in order to accept the trial period and will have the right to opt-out at any time during the trial period. Users will be automatically charged after the trial period if they haven't opted out.
- Subscription automatically renews unless auto-renew is turned off before the end of the current period
- Auto-renewal of your subscription can be canceled anytime by going to the Google Account Settings
-You can cancel your subscription at any time, but please note that you will not get a refund for any remaining period of a subscription

PRIVACY & ADVERTISING
Budge Studios takes children's privacy seriously and ensures that its apps are compliant with privacy laws. This application has received the ‚ÄúESRB (Entertainment Software Rating Board) Privacy Certified Kids‚Äô Privacy Seal‚Äù. For more information, please visit our privacy policy at: https://budgestudios.com/en/legal/privacy-policy/, or email our Data Protection Officer at: privacy@budgestudios.ca

Before you download this app, please note that it is free to try, but some content may only be available via a paid subscription or in-app purchases. In-app purchases cost real money and are charged to your account. To disable or adjust the ability to make in-app purchases, change your device settings. This app may contain contextual advertising (including the option to watch ads for rewards) from Budge Studios regarding other apps we publish, from our partners and from third parties. Budge Studios does not permit behavioral advertising or retargeting in this app. The app may also contain social media links that are only accessible behind a parental gate.

Please note that this app gives users the ability to take and/or create photos in-app that can be saved locally to their devices. These photos are never shared with other users in-app, nor are they shared by Budge Studios with any unaffiliated third party companies.

An internet connection may be required to use this app.

TERMS OF USE / END-USER LICENSE AGREEMENT
This application is subject to an End-User License Agreement available through the following link: https://budgestudios.com/en/legal-embed/eula/

HAVE QUESTIONS?
We always welcome your questions, suggestions and comments. Contact us 24/7 at support@budgestudios.ca

BUDGE and BUDGE STUDIOS are trademarks of Budge Studios Inc.

Barbie Dreamhouse Adventures ¬© 2018-2020 Budge Studios Inc. All Rights Reserved.

developerAddress:
5455 De Gaspe Ave
Suite # 540
Montreal, Quebec, Canada

recentChanges:
**HALLOWEEN UPDATE**
It's Halloween in the Dreamhouse! My sisters and I have been busy decorating with tons of spooky wallpapers, spider webs and pumpkins. Come and join us in these candy-filled festivities!

HALLOWEEN HUNT ‚Äì The Dreamhouse is filled with candies and you have to find them to get fun Halloween surprises, such as costumes, wallpapers, and much more. Isn't that fun?!
comments: I like this game sooooo much because I can cook to barbie, and we can go to the beach, salon, music stage, and we can go to different rooms and we can do different fun activities but only 1 thing I don't like, that is the payment. When I press the other characters, it shows the VIP club and we need to pay for it. Even though, I like this game

Hi, I am Sia. This app is good but the only thing is the vip club. I don't want to spend money on them and there are only 2 characters from which you can play but most of the things are in vip so we can't do very much in this game. I recommend that maybe you should open every thing in this app and make a shop for buying hearts which should be vip. Thank you

The game is awesome and the Anime is also good. also I recommend that this is the best app for barbie lovers, everything is just fine but the only thing that bothers me is that u have to pay to unlock some cool places, characters, features,so umm why don't you just make some of the character and features for free so that the games more interesting and fun!!!!! That's the only reason why I'm rating this game a 4 star's

This game is really fantastic. But I deducted 2 stars because you have unlocked really less things in the house and most of them are of VIP club. And the cost of the VIP club is also really high for a kids game. I hope you get those 2 stars as well, by improving the mistakes I told ‚≠ê‚≠ê. Best of luck for your game. üòä. Best of luck for your game. But it's a nice game. Graphics, Gameplay and the controls are also good.

This game is awesome to play.. I love the games made by budge studios.... Controls are very good. Graphics and sound is also too good. I would have given 5 stars, but I gave 4 only. Just because the reason of VIP CLUB. Please unlock some features for us from VIP club. Because this much rate of VIP club is very high for kids game. I request you. Plz....

title: Baby Princess Phone
description:
An incredible baby phone simulator, allows you to play in a world of princesses while you learn.

Your baby can play with the phone simulator he / she will not notice any difference.

Dial the phone and talk with the princesses of the stories

Have fun throwing magic wands to burst the colored bubbles, explode the magic bombs and the special powers that will make you win.

Take good care of your virtual pet, a baby unicorn, make it part of your daily life by feeding it, playing with it and taking pictures.

And he / she can also make some drawings in the paint application, full of color to a cake, a carriage or some cute unicorns.

Dress the princesses as you like, choose your dress and even the most beautiful crown.
¬†
This game was created for children to learn and play at the same time.
Try this fantastic game with many animations and colors to keep your child entertained.


--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Help us to improve! If you have any idea to make this game, an even more fun game, don't hesitate to contact us. Your comments, technical problems and suggestions are completely welcome.
Contact us: infigames.company@gmail.com
Get to know us: www.minibuu.com
Follow us: @minibuuofficial
Give us a Like on Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/minibuugames/

About Minibuu:
Minibuu is a company that develops fun and educational games for children. For us, children are the main source of inspiration, so we work to help them develop their imagination, creativity and knowledge.

Tips: In the search bar, type "Minibuu" to find all our games.

Privacy Policy
At Minibuu we understand the importance of the privacy of all our users. Get more information about our Privacy Policy by clicking on: http://minibuu.com/privacy-policy

title: Dailymotion - the home for videos that matter
description:
Are you a video lover searching for the next amazing story? Watch videos wherever life takes you, even when you're not connected to the internet.
‚Ä¢Explore the latest and greatest news, highest quality music, sports and more with our redesigned intuitive dailymotion app for Android.
‚Ä¢Immerse yourself in a world of videos delivered straight from the best publishers or tune into Daily Pulse, our daily selection of trending stories that the world will be talking about tomorrow.
‚Ä¢With dailymotion you can:
‚Ä¢Follow video updates from your favorite people, topics and channels
‚Ä¢Discover Daily Pulse, crafted for people who care about valuable news
‚Ä¢Save videos for later when you‚Äôre short on time
‚Ä¢Build and update your own video library
‚Ä¢Save data by taking your library anywhere for free with our offline mode
‚Ä¢Craft your own video playlists for a personalized video experience

developerAddress:
140 boulevard Malesherbes
75017 Paris, France
comments: I find that sometimes there are technical problems such as the the screen being pixelated(like a television screen type of pixalation) or the app itself not working/crashing without reason (I already checked my internet provider and it seems like it wasn't the source of the problem). I hope such issues would be resolved in the future. The design of the app is very neat and clean. Also, It's great that you've put your policies in the display.

Better than YouTube? Yes. Dailymotion has alot of content, movies to watch, a very clean interface and more up to date sleek channel design look, easy to browse, search filters for searching for videos. There are things which i would like to see for Desktop and Mobile. Dailymotion needs a night mode, the explore page needs a gaming and tech section, search filters needs to have more filters, bring back the thumb's up feature, the browse more section has too much sex and nudity kissing nonsense , that has nothing to do with what you're watching. Great site, but needs more features, but i do recommend Dailymotion over YouTube.

Giving this a 5 stat just because google reeeeeally wants me to delete the app. Whenever I get a notification about deleting apps to make room daily motion is always near the top of the list, despite the fact there are apps I haven't used in almost a year near the bottom. It seems if it's not owned by a big tech corporation Google thinks it's a waste of space on my phone. Couldn't possibly be that google doesn't like a YouTube competator being on my phone.

This actually regards the Smart TV app. It's horrible, logging me out often & we all know how tedious TV "keyboards" are for text entry. I have externally created playlists that do nothing. I can move to each playlist but clicking on it doesn't open it so all playlists are unplayable. Often, recommended videos start playing their audio stream in the background & can't be stopped. Other videos can't be played because unwanted, unstoppable content is already playing. Better 2 cast from Android app

Some, if not most of the videos require following a link to sign up with details. Its hard to find series that you can just watch direct. Plus not all seasons and episodes are available. But as im persistent I take my time to click many videos before I find a link free episode, then enjoy that, but it can be time consuming. Glad it's free tho!

title: Phone by Google - Caller ID & Spam Protection
description:
Google‚Äôs official phone calling app is now available to download for the first time. Phone helps you easily connect with family and friends, block spam callers, and know who‚Äôs calling before you answer ‚Äì all with a simple, intuitive design.

Powerful spam protection
See warnings about suspicious callers that help you avoid unwanted calls from spammers, telemarketers and scammers. Block numbers to prevent them from calling you again.

Know who‚Äôs calling you
Google‚Äôs extensive caller ID coverage lets you know the business that‚Äôs calling so that you can answer with confidence.

Screen unknown callers 1,2
Call Screen answers unknown callers, filters out detected spammers without interrupting you, and helps you learn more about callers you don‚Äôt recognize before you pick up.

Visual voicemail 1,3
Check your messages without needing to call your voicemail ‚Äì view and play them in any order, read transcriptions, and delete or save them right from the app.

Intuitive design
Our simple, lightweight design keeps your favorite people just a tap away. Plus, switch to dark mode to save battery and reduce eye strain at night.

Emergency support 1,4
See your current location when you make an emergency call, and share information about the assistance you require, along with your location, to the emergency operator without speaking.

Phone app is available on most Android devices running Android‚Ñ¢ 9.0 and above.

1 Available only on some devices that have Phone pre-installed.
2 Automatic screening is available in the US only, English only. Manual screening is available in US, CA only, English only. Call Screen may not detect all robocalls or spam calls.
3 Transcription is available in the US only, English only.
4 Available in Australia, United Kingdom and the US only, English only.
