title: Standoff 2
description:
The legendary "Standoff" is back in the form of a dynamic first-person shooter!
New maps, new types of weapons, new game modes are waiting for you in ths incredible action game, where terrorists and special forces going to engage the battle not for life, but to death.

The game is at the beta-testing stage at this moment:
- 6 maps
- 3 game modes ("Deathmatch", "Defuse the bomb", "Arms race")
- Friends
- Lobbies
- Messaging
- Trades between players
- HUD and crosshair customization
- Text chat
- A lot of fun!

Next features: 
- New game modes ("Capture the flag", "Robbery")
- Competitive games ("Defuse the bomb")
- Tournaments
- New models of knives, grenades, new weapons
- More maps and skins

Let the battle begin!

----------------------------------------------------
We're in VK: https://vk.com/standoff2_official
We're in Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/Standoff2Official
We're in Twitter: https://twitter.com/so2_official

recentChanges:
Season 2 has started!
Join a clan war together with your team! Take part in clan vs. clan battles based on competitive rules.
Explore the autumnal Rust map!
Leaves under your feet, ominous fallen trees, and ravens cawing eerily in the distance.

comments: This game is good! It's like csgo but in mobile. The game is perfect. But I would suggests adding voice chat, molotov and make more maps. But don't rush it, just take your time to do it. I appreciate your work. There's also a bug when I reload a gun, the magazines disappear. Please fix it but otherwise the game is awesome.

I played this game before and I also have rated 5/5 because it was amazing but after these updates it takes 10mins to get into any match even tho I have stable internet connection, I am changing servers but still the problem is there. I'm forced to drop only 1/5 because 5 days and I haven't even played even one match. Takes 15min but in the end it says "Check internet connection".

It's one of the best mobile fps games out there. If you like CSGO, then it's likely you're gonna love this. Graphics, player control, and game balance are all superb. BUT I had to take away one star from my previous rating, because after the latest update there have been numerous glitches: you can't see your hands on CT side, opponents deform, glitch and altogether disappear at times, and the servers are lagging worse than I've ever seen. Just a lil heads-up. Hope you can patch it up soon!

The new update is pretty great, but there is also a huge issue about it, the battle pass missions are taking way too long to finish. I am champion last season so my skill is above average, but it takes me at least 1.5hours to complete daily missions and only a few weekly missions, that is too long for a student and a content creator as me. Hopefully you guys can easier the missions as what u guys did last season or add coins we get after we finish a mission.

Its a good game i see major changes in graphics quality and much more like the new training group which helps to improve skills.. I see a bug which is whenever i choose ct(counter terrorist) i cannot see my hands its like the gun is floating just the thing u need to work on Except that its 10/10. Keep the good work

title: Bricks Ball Crusher
description:
Welcome to "Bricks Ball Crusher!" We're back with more new content!

Bricks Ball Crusher is a classic and exciting brick game. Just play this game to relax your brain and have fun. This game is fun and challenging.
Just touch on the screen to shoot your physics balls and break the bricks.
Remember, you must break as many bricks as possible to get the highest scores and pass the levels!
We have added many special balls and surprise gifts to help overcome obstacles and get you through tough levels.

We hope that you will fall in love with this game!

Features:
1. Free to play
2. Smooth control
3. 5000+ levels
4. wonderful physics experience
5. 30+ balls and so many different bricks
6. you can play without wifi.
7. subscription options.

Download and compete with friends around the world!

comments: Fun game but ridiculous amount of adds. I refuse to pay for the no add option based off reviews. Looks like it doesn't matter if you pay or not. Is it really necessary to have to sit through adds to do anything? And I mean anything. Even if I win a level still have to watch one to move on. I spend more time watching adds than playing the game, I'm seriously thinking about deleting this app because of this!!!

Started out fine. But like other reviews have said, recent changes eliminated the consecutive games bonus ball chances. Sometimes watching the ads gets you nothing so the bonus are even more useless. I'm stuck on a level, I'm out of all my props, and no matter how many ads I watch I can't seem to have enough bonuses or luck to move passed the level. I guess I'm done playing this game (that I did buy the ad free version of in the first place)

I love this game but I'm deleting it today, I had an internet outage and I played this game it ran up 10$ worth of cell data usage in one day I assume from loading the same fours adds over and over and over and over, well you get the picture, I didn't and I learned I have never bought something from one of there adds, and now I won't have to see another ad from them again, but it's a really fun game.

The game is fun as an arcade game. Play a level and then get back to whatever work you were doing. What annoys me the most is that everytime you open the app it takes 5 seconds to show you a pop-up of the diamond membership. WHICH I HAVE NO INTEREST IN SIGNING UP FOR. I cannot recall the number of times I was about to select a level and accidentally selected one of the options for membership ALMOST making an in-app purchase without my consent. I don't mind the ads. But this is just frustrating.

It IS a pretty good game. But I watch enough ads to earn you money without them being shoved down my throat for just loading the damn game! Every greed driven game gets a 1 star rating from me. Want me to change it? Stop being greedy and understand it is just a game. You can't eat it wear it or live in it, therefore it is NOT worth what you are demanding for it!

title: Word Search
description:
This Word Search game has more than 22000 puzzles distributed in 37 languages, 3 sizes and 3 difficulties!


DIFFICULTIES:
- EASY: search horizontally, vertically and diagonally
- MEDIUM: same as easy and also search backwards
- HARD: same as medium and you have just a clue about the word (only available on some languages)

FEATURES:
- focused on a smooth gameplay
- 14 achievements from google play games
- option to receive a hint about a word location
- option to solve the entire puzzle
- grid lines for better visualization

Fun app user-friendly. No confusing multicolor highlighting.

title: Word Connect
description:
Do you enjoy the excitement of classic word games? Are you a real puzzle game master? DOWNLOAD Word Connect for FREE! Start your word story and enjoy the brainstorm NOW! 
 
Simply swipe the letter blocks and build words to collect coins! Find the clues to solve the crossword puzzles! DOWNLOAD Word Connect NOW to begin training your brain and become a word master!
 
It‚Äôs time to uncover hidden words and build as many words as possible! Come and begin your word story!
 
What makes Word Connect so special?
 
‚Ä¢ Authoritative Dictionaries! The game is powered by Oxford Dictionaries.
‚Ä¢ Addictive gameplay! Simply swipe the letters to build words! 
‚Ä¢ Tons of words! 10900 levels in total await!
‚Ä¢ Different Modes! You can choose from normal mode, crossword mode and the daily challenge! Come and solve different puzzles!
‚Ä¢ Daily Bonuses! Log in every day to play exciting daily puzzles to collect big bonuses!
‚Ä¢ Alternative Themes! Up to 11 cool themes for you to choose from!
‚Ä¢ Vintage Style! Our wooden block graphics will bring back nostalgic childhood memories!
‚Ä¢ Hidden Bonus! Extra words are waiting to be discovered! Find extra words to collect bigger bonuses!
‚Ä¢ Play Together! Ask your family members and friends for help to solve the puzzles and send coins to each other on Facebook!
‚Ä¢ No time limits! You can use your time wisely to find new words at your own pace!
‚Ä¢ Level List! Want to check previous levels? Go back to the Level List and play again!
‚Ä¢ Offline Mode! No wifi? Don‚Äôt worry, you can play Word Connect anytime, anywhere even without a network connection!
‚Ä¢ Multiple Choices! Supported on both phone and tablet.
 
Word Connect is an app designed to train your brain and learn new words all while having a great time. Share the fun with your family & friends and enjoy Word Connect together!

This year, we are going to have a series of updates to bring you a better game experience! Get ready for the new era of Word Connect and enjoy your own word story!

comments: My experience with Word Connect is fairly limited. I`ve only played it for about 8 hours, much less than the 30 - 40 hours I'd normally play a game before giving a review of it. I like the bonus frequency, amounts of the bonus', and variety of characters. Games are challenging and hints are very helpful. Well, off I go to hopefully complete another level. Good Luck everyone.

Too many ads and some that run too long. Been playing this game for over 4 years and it used to be my favorite game, but now it is my least liked game due to the ads and too many game competitions. It needs a feature that allows players to communicate with one another or the developer via chat or something similar for either questions, concerns, assistance, etc. I don't mind ads, but not ads that take up more time than playing the game. Wish the developer would consider these changes.

Love it. Very challenging. I play everyday. Gets a little tougher the more you play. In love with this game. This game is very mentally challenging. I'm addicted. can't stop playing. Got my husband playing with me.Great way to pass time and I'm learning new words. I am truly addicted. Still playing everyday. Can't wait to beat the daily challenge. So much fun. Joined a team. Adds alot of fun.

I like the game, mostly. But, I often spend twice as much time waiting for the ads to run than I actually do playing. And, a lot of the ads run consecutively. For things I have no need of (seriously, a man having to watch women's?!?) Plus, there are a lot of words that don't seem to be in the dictionary. The scoring is strange. Often it's by the word, not the complexity. So you get more points for 5 3-letter words than for 1 7-letter one. But it's fun, and can be challenging.

Good most of the time but frustrating in a couple of areas. For example, it won't accept all words, only those that have been predetermined. There are glitches in the reward system ... too often you get a message saying 'Oops, there was a problem' and you don't get the opportunity to claim your point rewards. In team challenges there are usually 20 out of 50 people who contribute absolutely nothing but still get equal rewards. If you can overlook these, then it's an entertaining game.

title: Plague Inc.
description:
Can you infect the world? Plague Inc. is a unique mix of high strategy and terrifyingly realistic simulation.

Your pathogen has just infected 'Patient Zero'. Now you must bring about the end of human history by evolving a deadly, global Plague whilst adapting against everything humanity can do to defend itself. 

Brilliantly executed with innovative gameplay and built from the ground up for touchscreen, Plague Inc. from developer Ndemic Creations evolves the strategy genre and pushes mobile gaming (and you) to new levels. It‚Äôs You vs. the world - only the strongest can survive! 

‚óà‚óà‚óà #1 top game globally with 200 million+ games played ‚óà‚óà‚óà

Plague Inc. is a global hit with over half a million 5 star ratings and features in newspapers such as The Economist, New York Post, Boston Herald, The Guardian and London Metro! 

The developer of Plague Inc. was invited to speak at the CDC in Atlanta about the disease models inside the game!

‚ñ∂ ‚ÄúThe game creates a compelling world that engages the public on serious public health topics‚Äù ‚Äì The Centers for Disease Control and Prevention
‚ñ∂ ‚ÄúBest Tablet Game of 2012‚Äù - New York Daily News 
‚ñ∂ ‚ÄúPlague Inc. should not be as much fun as it is‚Äù ‚Äì London Metro 
‚ñ∂ Winner ‚Äì ‚ÄúOverall Game of the Year‚Äù ‚Äì Pocket Gamer
‚ñ∂ ‚ÄúKilling billions has never been so fun‚Äù ‚Äì IGN 

‚óà‚óà‚óà

Features: 
‚óè Stunning HD graphics with a highly polished interface (Contagion guaranteed) 
‚óè Highly detailed, hyper-realistic world with advanced AI (Outbreak management) 
‚óè Comprehensive in-game help and tutorial system (I am Legendarily helpful) 
‚óè 12 different disease types with radically different strategies to master (12 Monkeys?) 
‚óè Full Save/Load functionality (28 Saves Later!) 
‚óè 50+ countries to infect, hundreds of traits to evolve and thousands of world events to adapt to (Pandemic evolved) 
‚óè Full game support for scoreboards and achievements 
‚óè Expansion updates add the mind controlling Neurax Worm, the zombie producing Necroa Virus, Speed Runs and real life Scenarios!

Localised in English, German, Spanish, Brazilian Portuguese, Italian, French, Japanese, Korean and Russian. (more coming soon) 

P.S. Give yourself a pat on the back if you got all the themed literature references! 

Special sale price to celebrate being the 15th most popular touchscreen game of 2012!

‚óà‚óà‚óà

Like Plague Inc. on Facebook: 
http://www.facebook.com/PlagueInc 

Follow me on Twitter: 
www.twitter.com/NdemicCreations

recentChanges:
Mutation 17 - The Fake News update
From wild conspiracy theories to election campaign mudslinging, we now live in a post-fact world where falsehoods and misinformation can spread just like a disease.
With help from professional fact checking organisations like 'Full Fact' in the UK and 'Politifact' in the USA - we've designed a radically different scenario which lets you create your very own Fake News story and deceive the world with it.
comments: it is a great game. you can decide how bad things can go or start of gental. plus I like the fact that if you have 2 certain symptoms it is a combo. I just wish there were more difficulties even though it is a free version I just wish there was more difficulties. besides that great game. also I like that the more deadly the virus the harder they work for a cure. it is like real life the more deadly the disease is the harder we work to cure it.

The game is great, all of the different plagues are unique (Shadow Plague is my favorite), I do have two issues however. The better UI is locked behind a paywall just so you can have a bar showing the percentage of infection, and the UI constantly breaks anyway (usually in text boxes, with words being cut off or missing, the News tab also tends to just not show anything, making it difficult if you are loading a save and don't know what scientists benefit from).

This game is exactly what it sounds like. A hyper-realistic simulation of spreading diseases that lead to the extinction of humans. As dark as that sounds, the game is engaging because of its realism and suspense. It makes you sit at the edge of your seat, since you don't know what exactly will happen. For these reasons, this game is timeless, as it teaches extremely important lessons about disease management, in a thrilling, intruiging, and thought-provoking manner. It's informative yet fun.

It's such a cool game. You can give your desease different characteristics such as what climate it can survive in. You can choose to make it more harmful or less. You have to find a balance so that you don't make it too noticeable, yet contagious, not to deadly so it can spread, but can still wipe out humanity before a cure. You can also choose to start it most places in the world. What I don't like is that it makes Ireland apart of the UK. ü§¶‚Äç‚ôÇÔ∏è

This game is really fun if you just want to take your anger out on Humanity seeing the world-end within just a couple of years is kind of scary when you think about it besides that, this game is pretty fun oh yeah I thought I'd might mention that this game takes a lot of time and patience and I suggest reading over your symptoms of your virus. Oh yeah heads up you might want to get it on the computer it's better on PC

comments: Cool! Now whenever I whistle my phone says "Come on!" in the challenging voice of Duke Nukem. Easy setup and it sounds just like the classic video game. (My own sound file). You supply custom sound file. (It comes with six sounds.) I'm gonna get the ad free once I pay a few older bills. *Sigh*. Edit: now I changed it to say "Gin!" So I respond with such half-witty repartee as "at this hour?!" No, whisky!" And "Alright, I'm sending you to Betty Ford" if it's a song that keeps hitting the note.

It isn't always reliable and you am have to be able to whistle but apart from that it's fine theirs not many ads in the slightest and it makes finding your phone a lot better plus it let's you customize if you want a flash or vibration on your phone when it plays.You can also make turn it off so when your on your phone you can prevent it from going off. So over all it's a 4 star for me

Just downloaded this app, so far its good. My only concern is the option to choose your own sound. It doesn't show all the sounds I have in my device. It only shows the ringtones for google hangouts. Is there something wrong with my phone, or it's the app itself?

Great app. It can hear my whistles from the other room :). However, it reacts to other things too such as squeaky doors, birds singing (NOT whistles), and my dog woofing. I set the tune to meowing so now my phone meows wherever I go lol.
This app is so cool! The only problem is it doesnt work sometime when I whistle. I have an idea for this app just yell what word that you typed in that would be cool! üòÖüòÖ

title: Sandbox Pixel Coloring
description:
Welcome to the Sandbox Coloring Universe and be ready to become a lover of the coloring of tiny pixel art.

Four facts about Sandbox:
    - Children feel how light, sweet and funny Sandbox is and that it's made just for them. It's like cartoons, but they can participate in the performance, not only to watch.
    - Parents know it's a great way for the whole family to spend time together. No Ads. Only safe art.
    - Specialists know Sandbox is a great opportunity to work on your children's or parents' drawing and motor skills.
    - Teachers know Sandbox is a great way to teach their kids or students basic number recognition and how to use a legend.

Features available for all:
    - Search whatever you want, fruit, lips, gadgets, cats or maybe easy art. Handy search feature filters all content for you.
    - Magic Round Button helps you to find similar art. Just try it and you'll love it.
    - Collections give you an opportunity to organise all your art in the app.
    - Free Drawing Mode lets you practise drawing pixel art. The best art will be featured.
    - Turning your photos from the gallery into pixel art. No words needed.
    - Hints highlight the most interesting art especially for you. 

Best regards, Sandbox Team [with love]

comments: overall pretty fun, but the app will not let me pay for the subscription. I was able to get through to the 7 day free trial but it won't let me color any premium pictures because I "don't have premium" and it won't let me select another option. I went and cancelled my trial and went back to try again and still nothing. I'm sorry, but it's unethical to take a form of payment from someone for a premium service and then not deliver on said service, even if it has a one week free trial.

I love this app, I have been using it for at least two years and I find it very relaxing and enjoyable. BUT~~ I have notced that recently there are pictures showing up that are exact repeats of something I have already finished. That would be the reason I never gave a 5 star rating, and i hope that these instances do not happen any more. Other than that I highly recommend trying the app.

It's really fun but I can't figure out how to silence the noise for coloring (the tapping not asmr) other than silencing my phone and it's really annoying coz I like listening to my music while playing. Other than that the app runs well with lots of different pictures and a dark mode. I'd recommend. If I get a way to mite the sounds I'll give a 5 star.

I love the App but it can use a few new features to improve the app/game that I would recommend are; 1. Finding a picture/creation by the color most used in it. Like if you where to want to find only stuff that is blue for example. 2. A more clean light/dark/automatic themes. 3. A way to filter out works you had already colored. 4. When creating a work of your own it would be nice to have different sizes in stead of the one size. Ex. Large, Medium, and/or Small. Please consider this thanks!

Great fun! I can colour when I'm bored, draw when I want and it even helps when I'm feeling a bit down because it is relaxing... Also, I love the double tap because it saves time! Just a bit confused - I think double tap filler should start enabled instead of having to open the settings menu to enable it. I But still love it!!! I'm kinda sad though... I made my own pixel art but when I restarted my phone, I signed in, but all my pics weren't there. I worked hard on those but now they are gone üò¢

title: News Break: Local Breaking Stories & US Headlines
description:
Local headlines and breaking news ‚Äì get your local news, crime updates,  results and coverage, sports updates and U.S. headlines straight to your phone, with News Break.

Connect with your local community and follow U.S. headlines such as the local news, sports events, lifestyle stories, and even crime updates and traffic. News Break is personalized to your interests, likes and dislikes, so you‚Äôll always get relevant stories that really matter to you.

News Break helps people live safer, more vibrant, more truly connected lives. Whether it‚Äôs your local sports team, lifestyle tips, local headlines, breaking stories, U.S. news and updates ‚Äì you can access local, relevant stories and world news with just a tap.

U.S. News and Highlights

‚Ä¢ Get a curated daily brief focused on breaking stories, the U.S, local headlines, crime updates, traffic, events, sports updates and more U.S. news and local updates
‚Ä¢ Our intelligent local news platform aggregates rich, relevant stories from more than 10,000 trusted news outlets across the U.S.
‚Ä¢ Breaking news - be the first to know about breaking local news, U.S. headlines, world news and local updates

Local Updates: Know Your Town

‚Ä¢ Find local restaurants, local events, shop openings, traffic, breaking stories, and more ‚Äì all in a single app!
‚Ä¢ Read unique perspectives and personal stories from local writers and content creators
‚Ä¢ U.S. headlines, sports updates, lifestyle stories and local events - focus on the incredible things that are happening right where you live and work!

News Commentary: Express Yourself

‚Ä¢ Don‚Äôt just read the news, discuss it with other News Break readers!
‚Ä¢ News Break welcomes all respectful perspectives and points of view

Support the Cause

‚Ä¢ News Break is working hard to revive the local-news ecosystem by supporting small publishers around the U.S.
‚Ä¢ We‚Äôre activating legions of local bloggers and content creators ‚Äì people just like you ‚Äì that have important things to say about their communities. Join in and share your views & news!

What are you waiting for? Download News Break today and start living a safer, more vibrant, more connected life through the power of local news, U.S. news and information!

Your place for local updates, breaking stories and world news. News Break ‚Äì Better Informed, Better Life.

comments: It's a pretty nice app. Loads of information and tons of links. The guys are great. If they run across something that you like, they will email you or text ya. They we're just letting me know about Tom's Place. It's really good too. Kinda slow at times but it's not bad. I would definitely recommend üòä this app.

I am tired of this app crashing, repeatedly. I will be in the middle of an interesting article and the app closes and restarts. I even deleted it and reloaded it and it still happens. To make things worse, I can't always find the article I was reading again. Annoying. Update...Still happening. Still annoyed.

it is a nice site- if you're into everything - I initially downloaded for my breaking neighborhood news - tried to adjust the notifications level to no avail - it resets itself for push, for local, for comments. it slowly started to take up my whole screen with updates on the same story, with nothing new to report on. I had to uninstall. :( updated 10/31 - app send emails only now :) it seems as though it has improved and I look forward to reading the articles now.

I've been using News break for about a year now, and it's been informative and accurate in relating the news. I like this app mainly because if it's wide variety of topics and interest pieces. My news etc. is ALWAYS just a few inches from me. I don't have to go buy a newspaper for almost $2.00 everyday. I feel I get the news I need to keep me up to date between this app and watching Action news a couple times a day.

The developer needs to work on this site!!! They do not respond back, or even care about issues. It freezes up and sometimes takes 30 minutes to as you to "stop"/"wait" or "close out" by that time you are other places. They load too many ads for the screens and ones that take over the whole screen where you can not close out of,you have to leave the app, and come back never to read the article you were trying. The ADs do not format to fit the page right. I need more space here to address issues

- The ball flies to wherever you touched.
- Clear the stages by removing bricks on the board.
- Break the bricks and never let them hit the bottom.

comments: The GAME is great, the 30 second ads between EACH AND EVERY BOARD! Not Cool, INTERUPTING MY GAME PLAY TO SHOW AN AD AND THEN CHANGING MY POSITION ON THAT BOARD TO MAKE ME LOSE THE BOARD WHEN I WAS 2 MOVES FROM WINNING?!?! Well, THAT gets you UNINSTALLED! If you're considering downloading this, PLEASE BELIEVE ALL THE NEGATIVE REVIEWS, some are just being KIND! This is the WORST I've ever seen. There are other games like it, try one of them & avoid this LOOSER! UNINSTALLING!!!! NOTHING BUT GREED!

Love this game. I see people complaining about the ads, but I really haven't experienced this. I know an ad pops up each time you lose a level and have to restart, but if you're smart, you can avoid actually "losing" any level. I'm not going to divulge this trick since it would interfere with their ability to make money, but come on people. Even if you do have to watch an ad between attempts or levels, it's a free game with THOUSANDS of free levels. Calm down.

(ed) 10/27/20... still enjoy playing will leave rating as is unless issues are not resolved. Last 2 weeks off & on unable to watch ad to cont., with level which is an uninstall issue. Lost a level & had to repeat but I think fluke. 1rst issue not fluke. Have put a little $ in for extra balls & to say thanks. Hope to continue playing// Its addicting and I enjoy it. Ads are short and are really good. Tried several games from the ads.

This game would be great comic it doesn't give me a stupid commercial every single time I pause like other games have done, it gives reasonable commercials reasonable times‚Ä¶ but it breaks down. I have tried to undo a move twice in the last couple of days, and not only does it take away the gems I ever earned, but it doesn't undo the move, moves the blocks down and completely screws up the game even more. Extremely frustrating. Other than that, though, it's a great game.

The game is simple easy and better than any other. The ads aren't too Terrible, you can close them out instantly when you get an ad to go to the next level or forfeit the level, if you want the free rewards, you'll get an ad the you have to watch in full, but that's understandable. I highly recommend, and I've had this game for over a year and a half. It saves data if you create an account which has proved incredibly reliable since I've had to get multiple new phones. Great game.

title: Warfarin Dose Calculator
description:
Warfarin Dose Calculator is a medical app that was created by a physician and makes warfarin/Coumadin (a blood thinner for blood clots) dosing easier, especially for physicians (specialties can include: cardiologists, primary care, internal medicine, family medicine) and other healthcare providers (Medical Students, Nurse Practitioners and Physician Assistants). 

Input INR and total weekly dose on a slide, and you get a daily dose range and a dose change range to help you calculate the best dose possible for your patient! 

IMPORTANT: This app is for informational purposes only and results should be recalculated by other means to confirm accuracy. Disclaimer, terms and conditions, and end user licensing agreement (EULA) must be agreed to before proceeding to the calculator.

title: Prey Day: Survive the Zombie Apocalypse
description:
In 2033, the world saw the outbreak of an unknown infection that left most of the human population dead.

Prey Day is an online, multiplayer, top-down shooter survival game which takes place in a huge city in a world after a zombie apocalypse. An unknown virus destroyed a large part of the population, leaving only the last handful of survivors on earth. Most of the inhabitants have become zombies or mutated under the influence of the virus. Among the labyrinth of empty streets, survivors fortify camps to resist zombie hordes, and venture outside to discover the cause of the infection that left the world in a state of survival.

You are one of the few survivors whose destiny is directly related to these events. In your life after the apocalypse, you'll deal with hunger and thirst, look for other survivors' camps, and spend your dark days crafting your own shelter from gathered materials. Investigate the causes of the infection that triggered the apocalypse by completing quests. Explore the darkest corners of the City to craft unique armor and weapons. Build vehicles that will grant you access to secret areas.

Confront other survivors, greedy for the loot you carry. Unite with others in the streets of Harbortown to fight back zombies and other survivors hiding and hunting for easy prey. Gather your friends and venture together into the most dangerous parts of the city.

HUGE ONLINE WORLD
The world of Prey Day is an open world shooting game set in a vast city destroyed by a wave of infection. You are left to survive with other humans - the real players. You can communicate with any player you meet, join them in a group, or fight against them to take their loot. There are no rules in open world games!

CLANS
Unite with other players in powerful clans, opening access to clan locations, where you can discover rare items and unlock new craft that can help you in the war against the undead. Together with your clan you can take over abandoned military bunkers, establish a clan base, and start real military action on the streets.

CRAFT
You can craft new weapons and equipment from various items collected on your journey. Trigger new craft recipes that can help protect your life against other players - crafting skills allow you to build your own shelter and protect it with traps!

ADVENTURE
What caused the apocalypse? In this zombie game you'll complete quests and explore Harbortown. The best zombie games have rich, mysterious storylines, and Prey Day is no different. Plunge into a whole series of adventures, going down into the city subway, traveling to the mountains and national parks on the edge of the city, and venturing through the wasteland, all while shooting your way through hordes of the walking dead.

RPG AND SURVIVAL
Prey Day is one of the most dangerous zombie survival games full of players who may have different goals and methods of survival - run, shoot, defend, team up, target, and fight real players fighting for survival just like you. Shooting games challenge your skill, speed, and reaction time, and when you're fighting for survival, you'll do everything you can not to die. With both co op and PVP elements, you can communicate and unite with friends, or oppose and kill competitors - the best traditions of MMO and online multiplayer games!

comments: This is a slow process game. But it will keep you entertained. The graphics are decent and as well as the player movement. But with the new update and the maps change. Some of the items you get are inside the buildings. Which there is no way of getting to. You lose hunger and hydration to fast. The research to do more then 1 material at a time is kinda annoying. I would suggest lowering that a bit. Also getting a better backpack in the begining as well. Thank you hope to change rating soon.

Overall, it's OK. Good game, but with a few bugs that needs some tweaks. My problem is just that when I was on a pvp area, I got disconnected. When I logged back in, I LOST ALL MY STUFF. I'm literally at the area WITHOUT ANY OF MY STUFF. This might be a bug or something as I didn't die, yet lost everything in my inventory. Devs, please fix this, just please.

Game is slow to advance it's very difficult to get anywhere or generate resources .plus you lose all resource once your killed whic makes it even more impossible unless you purchase there packets which does you no good once you killed . So if you want to waist your time and repeat the same slow going process over and over with out spending a fortune just to lose everything you just purchased have at it. Oh and one more thing every enemy no mater what size or level is stronger than you ,faster

1 star, the New update destroyed the game. Instead of adding new multilayer and trading options they made the existing trading/pvp systems much worse. Also removed free options for farming to be replaced by new pay to play farming options. Peel back this update and create real multi-player options for your game or watch it die. Seriously like 30% of your players quit overnight. Idiots.

My last review of this game wasn't great but they need to fix the connection lost issues. The network connectivity in this game is the worst I have experienced so far. For a game with multiplayer features, it's connection issues is very bad and I have a fibre broadband at home and this issue still persist especially with watching ads for more loot which is good but if connecting afterwards takes over 20 seconds and the enemies can attack you while this is happening is just terrible. FIX IT!

title: Quick Guide
description:
Please see the Kcentra¬Æ app information below.

WARNING: ARTERIAL AND VENOUS THROMBOEMBOLIC COMPLICATIONS

Patients being treated with Vitamin K antagonist therapy have underlying disease states that predispose them to thromboembolic events. Potential benefits of reversing VKA should be weighed against the risk of thromboembolic events, especially in patients with history of such events. Resumption of anticoagulation therapy should be carefully considered once the risk of thromboembolic events outweighs the risk of acute bleeding. Both fatal and nonfatal arterial and venous thromboembolic complications have been reported in clinical trials and postmarketing surveillance. Monitor patients receiving Kcentra, and inform them of signs and symptoms of thromboembolic events. Kcentra was not studied in subjects who had a thromboembolic event, myocardial infarction, disseminated intravascular coagulation, cerebral vascular accident, transient ischemic attack, unstable angina pectoris, or severe peripheral vascular disease within the prior 3 months. Kcentra might not be suitable for patients with thromboembolic events in the prior 3 months.

Kcentra is contraindicated in patients with known anaphylactic or severe systemic reactions to Kcentra or any of its components (including heparin, Factors II, VII, IX, X, Proteins C and S, Antithrombin III and human albumin). Kcentra is also contraindicated in patients with disseminated intravascular coagulation. Because Kcentra contains heparin, it is contraindicated in patients with heparin-induced thrombocytopenia (HIT).

Hypersensitivity reactions to Kcentra may occur. If patient experiences severe allergic or anaphylactic type reactions, discontinue administration and institute appropriate treatment.

In clinical trials, the most frequent (‚â•2.8%) adverse reactions observed in subjects receiving Kcentra were headache, nausea/vomiting, hypotension, and anemia. The most serious adverse reactions were thromboembolic events, including stroke, pulmonary embolism and deep vein thrombosis.

Kcentra is made from human blood and may carry a risk of transmitting infectious agents, e.g., viruses, the variant Creutzfeldt-Jakob disease (vCJD) agent, and theoretically, the Creutzfeldt-Jakob disease (CJD) agent.

Kcentra¬Æ, Prothrombin Complex Concentrate (Human), is a blood coagulation factor replacement product indicated for the urgent reversal of acquired coagulation factor deficiency induced by Vitamin K antagonist (VKA‚Äîeg, warfarin) therapy in adult patients with acute major bleeding or the need for urgent surgery or other invasive procedure. Kcentra is for intravenous use only.

------------------------------------

The Kcentra App provides fast access to helpful tools and information from the Kcentra website without the need for an internet connection.

APP FEATURES:
‚Ä¢ Dosing calculator and guidelines
‚Ä¢ Reconstitution instructional video and step-by-step guide
‚Ä¢ Administration guidelines
‚Ä¢ Patient monitoring information
‚Ä¢ Customer support information
‚Ä¢ Product reimbursement information
‚Ä¢ Product overview
‚Ä¢ Notification center
‚Ä¢ Personal bookmarking system


Please see full Prescribing Information and Important Safety Information, including boxed warning at www.Kcentra.com.

Kcentra is contraindicated in patients with known anaphylactic or severe systemic reactions to Kcentra or any of its components (including heparin, Factors II, VII, IX, X, Proteins C and S, Antithrombin III and human albumin). Kcentra is also contraindicated in patients with disseminated intravascular coagulation. Because Kcentra contains heparin, it is contraindicated in patients with heparin-induced thrombocytopenia (HIT).

Hypersensitivity reactions to Kcentra may occur. If patient experiences severe allergic or anaphylactic type reactions, discontinue administration and institute appropriate treatment.

In clinical trials, the most frequent (‚â•2.8%) adverse reactions observed in subjects receiving Kcentra were headache, nausea/vomiting, hypotension, and anemia. The most serious adverse reactions were thromboembolic events, including stroke, pulmonary embolism and deep vein thrombosis.

Kcentra is made from human blood and may carry a risk of transmitting infectious agents, e.g., viruses, the variant Creutzfeldt-Jakob disease (vCJD) agent, and theoretically, the Creutzfeldt-Jakob disease (CJD) agent.

Kcentra¬Æ, Prothrombin Complex Concentrate (Human), is a blood coagulation factor replacement product indicated for the urgent reversal of acquired coagulation factor deficiency induced by Vitamin K antagonist (VKA‚Äîeg, warfarin) therapy in adult patients with acute major bleeding or the need for urgent surgery or other invasive procedure. Kcentra is for intravenous use only.

------------------------------------

The Kcentra App provides fast access to helpful tools and information from the Kcentra website without the need for an internet connection.

APP FEATURES:
‚Ä¢ Dosing calculator and guidelines
‚Ä¢ Reconstitution instructional video and step-by-step guide
‚Ä¢ Administration guidelines
‚Ä¢ Patient monitoring information
‚Ä¢ Customer support information
‚Ä¢ Product reimbursement information
‚Ä¢ Product overview
‚Ä¢ Notification center
‚Ä¢ Personal bookmarking system


Please see full Prescribing Information and Important Safety Information, including boxed warning at www.Kcentra.com.
summary: Provides fast access to helpful tools and information from the Kcentra website.

title: Hello Stars
description:
Hello Stars is a puzzle video solving game.  It's easy to learn but very diffcult to master.

The job of each level is to guide a ball from a predetermined start point so that it touches all of the stars placed on the level. The ball and nearly all objects on the screen are affected by gravity. The first few levels are almost too easy, but as the difficulty increases you'll be thankful that you were able to practice the fundamentals of draw. As the game progresses, you'll have to use all sorts of theory to figure out a solution for each puzzle. 


The Game Features:
‚òÖ Hundreds of ways to solve each puzzle, can you find the best solution?
‚òÖ 220 of physics puzzles, more levels are comming soon!
‚òÖ Flexible thinking is going to become the key to victory.
‚òÖ Solutions can be found in the end of each level.
‚òÖ Play 100+ of challenging
‚òÖ Interesting physics puzzles, they're not as easy as they look.

comments: Fun Game, Too Many Ads. Finished a level? Watch an ad. Don't want an ad? Here's one anyway. Here's another ad, I didn't skip the last one fast enough. Way too much. I timed it and for every 2 minutes of actual gameplay, I had 3 minutes 48 seconds of total ads

It is really good in terms of the difficulty and the different gamemodes and I have to say that the sound and music is really good. There maybe too many ads but the is a cross button to click it away so not really a problem and I like the tutorial level as it is animated.

Annoying the app continues to show notifications even after they have been turned off, They just use a different push notification. I have had 6 notifications in 15 mins and I have now removed the app.

This game is fine in concept, unfortunately, it doesn't work in practice. A lot of puzzles require precise solutions, if you have big fingers, you've already lost. If you touch a wall, a simple solution would be to have the line skip over the wall, instead, you have to backtrack your fingere to draw it at a new angle. Not very practical, developers. This game was not made with the intention of satisfaction.

It's really unfortunate, because this game is kinda like Crayon Physics Deluxe, which I own but won't work. However, there's an ad after almost every quick puzzle, and you can't skip until the whole ad has played. Couple this with the fact that you can't simply pay to remove ads, but must purchase a subscription that's around 12 dollars a month. That's a little past insane.

title: AOTrauma Orthogeriatrics
description:
The AOTrauma Orthogeriatrics App (Orthogers) is an educational tool for healthcare professionals managing older adults with a fragility fracture. Its second release covers five areas of medical management: osteoporosis, delirium, anticoagulation, perioperative pain, and falls prevention.

The primary audience is surgeons and surgical trainees and the content is also appropriate for other physicians and professionals who are involved in comanagement. All information contained in the Orthogers App is intended for preparing medical procedures and considering clinical options and not as an aid while carrying out medical procedures or making and implementing clinical decisions. 

The content is presented through a series of decision pathways but is solely for educational purposes (ie, it is NOT designed for making diagnostic or treatment decisions for any individual patient). Orthogers is not designed for laypersons and all users must read and accept the Terms, Conditions, and Disclaimers within the App.

Changes in this updated version (3.0)
-	Falls prevention module added

Here‚Äôs what you‚Äôll get with Digital Secure.

Protect your device from online threats and get around-the-clock peace of mind.

With Digital Secure, it‚Äôs easy to make any Wi-Fi connection private. You‚Äôll get an on-the-go secure VPN connection so you‚Äôll be able to keep personal data and online activities to yourself.

Now many people cant even open the app. I was on level 1410, its a pity to lose all this progress. This game is so cool and I dont wanna put it in the garbage.

I loved the game until the new update, I was at level 1171. The new update made it so I can't even open the app anymore! I may never play again because I don't want to loose my levels. Also the controls sometimes glitch and if I try not to complete the line all the way around the obstacles it'll mark it as if I've touched it. The game is pretty enough for what it does.

Brilliant gameplay, my go to game. I was on level 482 before I updated. Now, the app won't even bloody open. I have been trying to open it for the last week or so but still no hope. I've tried every solution under the sun, except for deleting it because I don't want to lose my place in the game. Nevermind I guessü§∑üèª‚Äç‚ôÄÔ∏è

Nearly ADnoyance free casual game. Basically you try to paste the level area with your colour. Each level consists of two areas, sometimes without moving enemy elements. Nice casual no brainer albeit not difficult at all, no matter what the game ads say. Edit:app keeps stopping at start,will not run anymore. Since there was no update to the app I suspect the Corona terror related rubbish that was put into Android.

This game was my favorite game but after its latest update(the change of the icon of the game) the game had stopped working and is just taking my phone's storage and whenever I try to open this app it does not open and it shows that color fill 3D is not responding or it shows that color fill 3D keeps stopping and we always get 3 options 1. Write a feedback 2. App info 3. Close app and even after sending many feedbacks in which the same problem that is occurring is written but still it's the same

title: Bubble Witch 2 Saga
description:
From the makers of Candy Crush Saga, Bubble Witch Saga & Farm Heroes Saga comes Bubble Witch 2 Saga!

Stella and her cats need your help to fend off the dark spirits that are plaguing their land. Travel the realm bursting as many bubbles as you can in this exciting bubble shooting puzzle adventure. Win levels and free Witch Country piece by piece. Play this epic saga alone or with friends to see who can get the highest score!

Bubble Witch 2 Saga is completely free to play but some optional in-game items will require payment.

By downloading this game you are agreeing to our terms of service; http://about.king.com/consumer-terms/terms

Bubble Witch 2 Saga features:
‚Ä¢ The next exciting instalment to the Bubble Witch franchise 
‚Ä¢ New and improved game modes
‚Ä¢ Enchanting graphics that will leave you spellbound
‚Ä¢ Hundreds of magical bubble shooting levels ‚Äì more added every 2 weeks!
‚Ä¢ Easily sync the game between devices when connected¬† to the Internet
‚Ä¢ Leaderboards to watch your friends and competitors!
‚Ä¢ Collect stars to unlock special items to help you on your quest

title: Kill Shot Bravo: Free 3D FPS Shooting Sniper Game
description:
Welcome to Kill Shot Bravo! Free online FPS sniper shooting game on mobile! 
Go to war online and prove your sniper shooting skills in the king of multiplayer 3D sniper games.

Arm yourself with deadly sniper weapons, machine guns and the latest military gear to complete covert missions! All of this in a free online FPS multiplayer action shooting game. In Kill Shot Bravo, it‚Äôs your duty to save the world. That means hunting terrorists, killing zombies and waging war on evil armies. 

Call yourself a sharp shooter with pixel precision? Then put your skills to the test in the top free online multiplayer sniper game on mobile.  

*OVER 2400 MISSIONS*
As a Special Forces soldier your duty will be to navigate secret missions across the globe, shooting hostile army forces that stand in the way of a peaceful world.
If you love FPS sniper 3D killing games you'll love this.
‚Ä¢ From guerrilla combat in jungle mountain ranges, to recon missions on Mediterranean islands, to modern warfare in city streets you‚Äôll travel the world to gun down terror threats as an elite sniper. 
‚Ä¢ Commandeer vehicles to turn the tide of battle! Navigate close quarter combat down narrow alleys in the back of a jeep, or take out hostile threats by air in hazardous helicopter missions! 
‚Ä¢ Complete breach missions to enter occupied buildings and clear them of any threat! Survive a full on enemy attack in multiplayer assault games and shoot more enemies than your opponent. 
‚Ä¢ Move through stunning 3D environments to find the best sniper vantage points and take the all-important Kill Shot! 

Download the app now for free and enjoy regular updates with new regions and missions. This is one fps game you won‚Äôt get bored of. 

*GO TO WAR WITH THE ENEMY*
‚Ä¢ Shoot different enemy types each with their own strengths and combat objectives. Prove you can adapt to different shooting game styles. 
‚Ä¢ Unleash your fury and shoot down Flying Drones, Exo-Suit Soldiers, Zombies, Mechs, Heavy Gunners, sniper assassin Enemy RPGs, Marksmen, Riflemen, Commando Bombers and finally kill the boss.

*LIVE PVP SNIPER DUELS*
‚Ä¢ Clash against snipers in live online multiplayer Player Verses Player shooting matches in PVP mode!  
‚Ä¢ Be the hunter before you are the hunted!
‚Ä¢ Use your heat meter to zone in on the enemy threat. 
‚Ä¢ Find your target. Take aim. Shoot!
‚Ä¢ Online Multiplayer shooting games have never felt this real.

*JOIN ALLIANCES AND BOUNTY EVENTS*
‚Ä¢ This time you won't be fighting alone! Build powerful alliances with other shooters and help each other to complete the high-risk missions. 
‚Ä¢ Hunt and collect bounties from enemies.
‚Ä¢ Take out hordes of zombies in exclusive events. Work with your alliance to stop the Virus and start killing some zombies. New Zombie Shooter Game modes!
‚Ä¢ Friends can join you in multiplayer missions, spotting the targets and assisting you to shoot enemies.
‚Ä¢ Full Chat function in game to allow tactical discussions with other snipers.

*CUSTOMIZE*
‚Ä¢ Customize your avatar and get Perks to help in the battle! 
‚Ä¢ Unlock and equip cool army gear, including helmets, military uniforms, body armor, goggles, facemasks, gloves, boots, and more.
‚Ä¢ Get a fresh Kill Shot moment with every victory! Now YOU get to control the Kill Shot. This is a free online multiplayer fps sniper game with premium customized content. 

* GOOGLE PLAY SERVICES LEADERBOARDS AND ACHIEVEMENTS*
‚Ä¢ Compete for high scores alone or with your Alliance against opposing Alliances.
‚Ä¢ Earn Achievements for showing off your deadly sniper skills.
‚Ä¢ Take on weekly Quests to win additional prizes and achievements

OTHER FEATURES:
‚Ä¢ Free online multiplayer games and offline single player experience
‚Ä¢ 3D Guns, tons of sniper weapons

Play the Best Fun free FPS Sniper 3D Shooting Game on Mobile for Free!

¬©2020 Hothead Games Inc., Hothead, and Kill Shot are trademarks or registered trademarks of Hothead Games Inc., all rights reserved.

title: ASMR Slicing
description:
This is the most satisfying ASMR kinetic sand simulator cutting game. It's not just kinetic sand, there are multiple other awesome objects and shapes too! You've seen it in the ASMR videos and now you get to cut and slice and dice it yourself in this simulator!


Cut, slice and dice different shapes of kinetic sand and feel the amazing ASMR satisfaction. Many different types of objects available to cut! Feel the immense satisfaction!


Game Features:

- Realistic kinetic sand cutting and slicing simulator
- Many different types of objects to cut, slice and dice
- Smooth haptic feedback
- Relaxing ASMR sounds


Play now and start cutting!

"To opt out of CrazyLabs sales of personal information as a California resident, please visit our Privacy Policy: https://crazylabs.com/app"

comments: It *used* to be great... But apparently in a recent update they now made it so that you can't control the speed of the knife cutting. You used to drag it through the shape yourself and could cut as fast or slow as you liked. Now you just tap the screen and it cuts way too fast and they RUINED it.

The cutting table is the same colour as the things that you cut so it's not 'ASMR'. I'm on level 15 and they didn't give me anything so I have to keep going on the same kind of gift again and again. Don't anyone buy this.
Love it! The asmr relaxes me, calms me down, and alot more! I recommend downloading this! Keep up the good work asmr team!

title: Dress Up Games Free
description:
For all fashionistas and virtual doll styling fans here is the ultimate makeover app with tons and tons of clothes to rummage through. 

Style gorgeous models for 6 different occasions: prom night, shopping run, wedding, international beauty pageant, pop singer contest and a movie star award show. In each occasion, there is a separate wardrobe, with glamorous dresses, skirts, tops, jackets, capes, shawls and veils. Pick among dozens of chic hairstyles, fancy shoes, stylish handbags, luxurious jewelry and other accessories. Certainly you can also choose the race of the girls. 

The game boasts a huge selection of garments - likely more than you've ever seen in a cosplay & fashion simulator. Set your inner fashionista free and train you skill as an outfit designer / image maker for famous actresses, celebrities, top supermodels and glam socialites on the red carpet. Join the world of glamour, Hollywood and Broadway, and imagine you are a superstar, actress, supermodel, music idol or just a crazily rich VIP shopaholic posting hauler videos with millions of fans and subscribers. For even more fame and glory, become the Beauty Queen of the world and marry a millionaire (e.g. some handsome actor with an oceanside mansion in California). Pick a trendy hairstyle and put together amazing bridal or festive outfits for your celebrity model.

If your friends also love dressup apps and digital girl makeovers, be sure to tell them about this great new app! Download it and play it for free, forever, on your Android phone or tablet - it's really the best you've ever seen.

title: Verizon Messages
description:
Stay connected using Verizon Messages sync features for your Smartphone, tablet, and computer. Keep the conversation going even when you‚Äôre switching between devices. Connect with family, friends, teammates, and more through personalized group chats, texts, photos, videos and gift cards worth up to $100 at stores like Starbucks, Dominos, and more. Now anyone can download and chat with Verizon Messages, even non Verizon customers (available on compatible devices).

GROUP CHATS ‚Äì Create larger group chats with up to 250 people. Send and receive photos/videos in seconds. Personalize your chat experience with avatars, backgrounds and more. You can even mute a conversation or add or remove members or without creating a new group.
YELP INTEGRATION ‚Äì Tap the plus menu and easily access Yelp from within the app. Search for restaurants, entertainment and directions. Make plans and share the details all within your chat.
SHARE YOUR LOCATION ‚Äì Glympse‚Ñ¢ lets you share your location with the people you choose for the length of time you set. Perfect for meeting up, or letting people know you‚Äôre running late.
SEND AN eGIFT ‚Äì Tap the plus menu and select eGifts icon. Easily send an eGift card right through text message. eGifting has been expanded to include eGift cards from more than 30 brands
SYNC ACROSS DEVICES ‚Äì Download Verizon Messages on all your devices, and sync messages across your smartphone, tablet and computer. Switch devices whenever you want. Make calls with your tablet anywhere.
DRIVING MODE ‚Äì Turn on driving mode to send an Auto-Reply message and disable incoming message notifications so you don‚Äôt get distracted on the road.
HD VOICE CALLING ‚Äì Eligibility rules apply. Link your phone number to the Verizon Messages app on your tablet and make and receive calls wherever they want on any network (cellular or Wi-Fi).

Other features:
# Schedule messages to be delivered at a specific date/time, even if your phone is turned off.
# Search the web for images and gifs to include in your chat with Yahoo search.
# Express yourself through colorful Emoji‚Äôs by tapping on highlighted keywords when composing messages.
# Send and receive messages over Wi-Fi from your smartphone, iOS device, tablet, PC, MAC, and web browser.

Need Help? Visit our Support Pages at
http://support.verizonwireless.com/clc/features/data_services/verizon-messages.html
View the complete Terms & Conditions at:
https://www.verizonwireless.com/support/verizon-messages-legal/
View the Verizon Messages privacy policy at:
https://www.verizon.com/about/privacy/verizon-messages-app-privacy-policy

comments: On 9/14 /2020 my phone stopped sending and receiving picture, audio, video, and group texts. The other line on my account did the same thing. Same time. We have done the software and app updates and it still isnt working. Edit: It's now 10/29/2020. It has been 6 weeks and we still can't send or receive any media. This is ridiculous. I've reported it several times and no one seems to care to fix it.

The app was great until my last update. Now it doesn't alert me with a sound or a number to indicate how many messages I have, when I get a notification. I went into setting to make sure my permission is on, & it is. I have to tap on the icon & open it to see if I have any messages. I'm missing, important information & meetings if I don't keep looking!

Latest version is NOT as good as previous. When I upgraded phone to Galaxy s20, I expected the app to work better;thinking the software was not updating on an older model. Looking at other reviews, the new version of the app seems to be the issue. Since this is a new phone, I am stuck with non working version Auto Reply and scheduling features are now missing and not functioning over multiple devices. I preferred this app because it also worked with other service providers. No longer the case.

Recently switched to a new phone and I am not getting txt messaging unless I open the app. I have gone through all the settings and uninstalled/reinstalled the app but still no fix. I have reported the bug several time. Apparently, a lot more people are having the same issue of not getting txt messages on time unless app is open. Please fix this issue.

The app is great. Have used it for years, but just got a new phone and it uses the phones default notification sound when new texts come in. The only way to change it is to customize it in each text. You used to be able to change the notification sound in the main customization and all texts would come in with the sound you selected. That option is still there, but doesn't work anymore. I like different sounds for texts, emails, and regular notifications.

title: Piercing Parlor
description:
Can you handle the pain?
Become a piercing perfectionist and spread the bling!

Are you ready to experience your inner rebel? Ever wonder what it is like to get a piercing but your mom and dad said no? Wonder what you would look like with a piercing on your nose or lip? Now you can experience it all without feeling the pain! Fill in hundreds of different piercings and styles. Try to get the line up the requests as close as possible for them and don‚Äôt mess up! Get ready to feel the satisfaction of watching your needle slide right in! Relax and use your precision to point and aim the needle to make those holes. So many satisfying vibrations! Fun and easy to pick up but don‚Äôt miss a pierce... Will you be the first one to ring them all?

Hundreds of objects and styles for you to carefully size up, outline, design and pierce your customers. The final results will leave you feeling satisfied!
Game Features:

1. Simple but addicting mechanics
Feel the satisfaction without the pain? Customers will request what they want and it is up to you to match their desires

2. Run your own Piercing Parlor
Keep the customers coming. Whether it‚Äôs a heart, a zombie, or a skull, there are so many ear ring designs for you to give them.

3. Don‚Äôt miss
Ouch that hurts! Be careful of those soft spots

4. Feel the experience
Feel every stab with the best haptics experience there is.

Whether you like tattoos, needles or just want to pierce some people, Piercing Parlor will take you there. This is the best and most rewarding piercing simulation game there is. 

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                       


Visit https://lionstudios.cc/contact-us/ if have any feedback, need help on beating a level or have any awesome ideas you would like to see in the game!

comments: This game is horrible! There is ads for EVERYTHING!!! You have to watch an ad after every level, and the graphics are absolutely disgusting! I would never recommend this game. I did one piercing and I am uninstalling!! If I could rate this game lower than one star, TRUST ME!! This would have a negative 1000 star rating! Never again!

This game is an absolute joke. To many ads, and even if you pass on the upgrades it will still play at least one ad after every level some times more. You spend more time watching ads then you do playing the game. I've only done 3 piercings and I will be deleting this game. DON'T WASTE YOUR TIME!!!

This was a huge disappointment the game itself is a great design but after doing 2 people the game wigs out and makes it where you cant see anything so you have to close the app and reopen it , and not to mention when you're in the middle of doing something and then an add pops up not before or after no in the middle. Needs alot of work

Everything is very far off from where your finger actually is on the screen. You have to watch ads to do literally anything in the game, and, on top of those ads you have to watch to progress, you also get random ones too. I get that they need ads to make money, but this is ridiculous. Why have games come to this?

Yeah everybody's right about this game is way too many ads nobody should get this game cuz there's so much else you can't even play the game I got past the first episode then there's that and then I couldn't afford that because the video was so long and then I had to watch another ad before I picked it a different ear piercing and another add another another

title: Powerful Cleaner (Boost&Clean)
description:
Powerful Cleaner (Boost&Clean) is a super lite and effective memory boost tool and battery extender. It is helps to clean unnecessary apps in the background to boost your phone and save battery power. With proper management, its can make your mobile faster. 

Powerful Cleaner (Boost&Clean) uses the accessibility service. With this service, you can get an upgraded cache cleaner. Its can help you to force-stop the unnecessary application in background by ‚ÄúOne-step‚Äù.

We do not provide the service/content for any minors under 16 years old (or equivalent minimum age in relevant jurisdiction). If you are a minor meeting the above conditions, you must read the terms of User Agreement and use this app under the guidance of your guardian, and confirm that your guardian agrees to your Use of this app.

‚òÖJunk File Clean
Intelligent Cloud Engine reads everything and will make the junk files nowhere to hide. Powerful Cleaner (Boost&Clean) could clean the junk files, idle storage and useless large files from millions of apps, thus releasing plenty of free space.

‚òÖMemory Boost
By cleaning unnecessary background apps and process, the memory booster of Powerful Cleaner (Boost&Clean) can free up memory, make Android phone to run faster, and save much more battery power. With accessibility, this accelerator can prevent apps from auto restart and therefore provide durable boost effect to make phone faster. 

‚òÖCPU Cooler
This cleaner has accelerator which can detect and clean apps that consume CPU capacity highly and cause overheating. And by memory booster, it can cool down Android device as quickly as possible.

‚òÖApp Lock
With password to save you private applications.

comments: A convenient screen locker....I don't want it! But, it won't let me turn off that option. Every time I turn off the "convenient" screen locker, it reactivates on its own. When I turn it off, it displays the words "A Convenient Screen Locker", and it has the options "Yes" and "Stay". Either fix it right now, or I will uninstall it. There is nothing convenient about an unwanted screen locker that I don't have the option of deactivating. Are we clear on this? Update a few minutes later: You know what? This is too annoying to wait any longer. I already installed a better app that has better quality than this one. Therefore, I'm uninstalling this one. Good luck with your screen locker that can't be deactivated. See how many people will stick around for it.

This app is packed full with ads - the worst I have ever seen. It even interrupts you when on other apps, like Camera, and taking pictures, to play 2 ads in a row, one of which can't be turned off for as long as 11 seconds. Even when the app has been turned off. At every step, it will play as many as 4 ads in a row before letting you go on to the next step. This means you will have to page through 4 to 8 ads total just to perform one step of a function in the app. It plays 2 ads when your clock plays a preset alarm before you can turn the alarm off. Also to turn off your phone's screen, and when you try to wake the phone up from sleep. The cleaning functions all work ok, but they are nothing special. AVOID THIS APP. It is a complete pain.

Some of the fonts in other apps have change to outline after using this spp. I like help but not unnecessary changes. It is hard to read outline words. Hope you can look into this matter. Will things be back to normal should I uninstall this app.

I have always downloaded the CM Apps...Launcher, Security, Cleaner, Booster, Locker...etc Before I activate any new phone I make sure my CM Apps are in place. I have had very good results with the CM Guys and Gals and keep up the Fantastic Job !!! Colleen

Terrible, terrible app. Unlock your phone and see an app. Unlock your phone to see the weather you never asked for. Whenever you plug it in to charge, it locks the phone. More of an inconvenience than useful

title: Clumsy Ninja
description:
Meet Clumsy Ninja, the most hapless ninja ever to grace a touchscreen!

Train him, throw him, tickle him, and even tie balloons to him. Everything you do will make Clumsy Ninja more skillful, and help him find his missing friend, Kira.

Clumsy Ninja is the next generation of interactive characters! He can sense, feel, move, and react uniquely every time. Prepare to be amazed‚Ä¶oh, and please take good care of him!

BELT UP
Train your ninja to learn new tricks and super-special Ninja Moves! Impress his sensei and earn new Ninja Belts on your way to find Kira, or just have fun with over 70 unique interactive items, including trampolines, punch bags, ball guns, a chicken, and‚Ä¶ a squirrel!

ADVENTURE TIME
You and your ninja will travel to new locations, play new games, meet new characters, complete quests, and unlock fun new items to play with. How many will you discover?

CUSTOMIZE
Customize Clumsy Ninja‚Äôs suits, belts, and headbands to match your style. Take photos of your ninja‚Äôs craziest stunts. Keep your eyes peeled: there are many surprises waiting for you!

UNFORGETTABLE MOMENTS
Clumsy Ninja is a living virtual friend who thinks and acts with real intelligence - and a lot of clumsiness! You‚Äôll experience unique moments with your ninja and his companions every time you play!

FIRST ON TOUCH DEVICES!
Clumsy Ninja is the first game on touch devices to ever use the EUPHORIA simulation technology ‚Äì producing the most believable character you've ever seen.

Requires Android OS 2.3 or later. 

PLEASE NOTE! Clumsy Ninja is free to play, but it contains items that can be purchased for real money.
To prevent unauthorised purchases, select ‚ÄúSet or Change PIN‚Äù from the Google Play settings menu, create a PIN, then enable the ‚ÄúUse PIN for Purchases‚Äù option. You will then be required to enter your PIN before every transaction.

Requires Android OS 3.x and above

Clumsy Ninja is published by NaturalMotion Games Ltd

comments: A great, funny game, I have decided to revisit it after several years, but why is it so much harder to make the ninja stand on top of a tower or a crate than before? It gets annoying when he keeps on tripping himself for 5 minutes and can't stand straight. I have tried a lot of ways(Throw him/Gently place him, etc) sometimes it just comes to luck if he can stand or not, please fix this, thank you.

Honestly, this game was going so well for me personally till the controls and that started messing up bad. When you try and put your ninja on one of the towers you jump off, he wont stay there. He would stand there then walk off it without you telling him to walk somewhere. The camera with it is bad as well. If you try and put the ninja on the tower to jump onto a crate, the camera will move forward and make him stand on that instead, which is rather annoying.

Hi Clumsy Ninja Team. I love this game a lot but as many people's are facing this problem that progress doesn't save. Today I open it and played it I am on Level 29 and going to level 30 but when i opend it again then it get me back to level 1 please fix this issue. I have gain many progress coins all of other stuff please give my Progress back. I didn't expect this as i love this game and today this happened with me. Please Clumsy Ninja Team Fix It.üôèüôè

Love this game, played when I was little. Keep trying to improve the game. Anyone can enjoy even if they are 60 (lol). nothing else to say, but great game, I can see why its called clumsy ninja I've never seen a ninja this funny and clumsy. AMAZING!

The title of this game describes it perfectly. Be prepared for frustrating controls as the ninja flails and falls alot. It doesn't help that it can take quite a few seconds to recover his footing, even longer if he gets stuck in items as he rolls over. Get to the beams and it becomes much worse. Problematic depth detection and a small space to place the ninja resulted in over 5mins just to complete a beam session. Not recommended game unless you have a lot of patience and tolerance for failures.

title: Fibrilaci√≥nApp
description:
La aplicaci√≥n nos lleva en forma intuitiva sobre un algoritmo para el manejo de anticoagulaci√≥n oral en pacientes con FA, empieza al tocar el icono de fibrilaci√≥n auricular mostrando un ejemplo de esta en forma sencilla para su identificaci√≥n.
Luego el algoritmo separa la FA valvular de la no valvular y al tocar el icono de FA valvular, aparecer√° la definici√≥n aceptaba sobre lo que se considera como FA valvular, y quedando entonces como definici√≥n de FA no valvular todo lo que no est√° contemplado bajo la definici√≥n de FA valvular. 

En el icono de FA valvular, la aplicaci√≥n lo llevara a la indicaci√≥n absoluta de anticoagulaci√≥n con warfarina. Luego al hacer click en el icono de warfarina, esta lo env√≠a a determinar un score de riesgo SAMeTT2R2 score que eval√∫a la probabilidad de que el paciente tenga mayor chance de alcanzar el mayor tiempo en rango terap√©utico (TRT) as√≠: Si el paciente tiene un score del SAMeTT2R2 score < 2, esto sugiere que el paciente tendr√° una mayor probabilidad de alcanzar un tiempo en rango terap√©utico (TRT) > 65%; pero si el valor del SAMeTT2R2 score es > 2 estos pacientes tendr√≠an menor probabilidad de alcanzarlo, y por lo tanto se recomendar√≠a un manejo m√°s intensivo o en una cl√≠nica de anticoagulaci√≥n con vigilancia y seguimiento m√°s estrecho.  Luego de calculado SAMeTT2R2, el cual se encuentra dentro de la aplicaci√≥n, el algoritmo lo llevara a la recomendaci√≥n del INR adecuado para el paciente con FA. (INR entre 2.0 y 3.0). 

Si el paciente tiene FA no valvular, el click en ese icono, lo dirigir√° a evaluar el CHA2DS2-VASc que indicar√° que paciente no requiere ning√∫n tipo de anticoagulaci√≥n ni anti-agregaci√≥n (CHA2DS2-VASc = 0). Tambi√©n el score nos informara el riego anual de ACV (Ataque cerebrovascular isqu√©mico cardioembolico). La indicaci√≥n y la evidencia del uso de este score viene incluido en la app. Posterior a esta calculo la app lo dirigir√° a la evaluaci√≥n de riesgo de sangrado con el HAS-BLED (Tambi√©n incorporado en la app), y el resultado se presentar√≠a como bajo riesgo o alto riesgo de sangrado as√≠: Si el HAS-BLED es > 3 alto riesgo de sangrado que no contraindica la anticoagulaci√≥n y solo para modificar los factores de riesgo identificados. En la app tambi√©n hay lista adicional de factores de riesgo de sangrado usados en otros scores de riesgo. 

Luego del HAS-BLED, la app lo lleva al valor del CHA2DS2-VASc que c√°lculo y har√° la recomendaci√≥n de anticoagulaci√≥n o no. Para hombres anticoagulaci√≥n oral si CHA2DS2-VASc > 1 y para mujeres si CHA2DS2-VASc > 2. Definida la indicaci√≥n de anticoagulaci√≥n la app lo dirige para que calcule la depuraci√≥n de creatinina por la f√≥rmula de Cockcroft-Gault (Tambi√©n se encuentra dentro de la app). Junto con las evidencias que soportan esta indicaci√≥n. Si el c√°lculo de depuraci√≥n de creatinina es: > 30 mL/min, la app lo llevara a considera el uso de anticoagulantes orales directos (ACOD)[Apixaban, dabigatran o Rivaroxaban]. A preferencia de m√©dico tratante.
Y al hacer click en cualquiera de los ACOD, aparecer√° la informaci√≥n espec√≠fica de la mol√©cula basada en los resultados de su estudio cl√≠nico, y la dosis recomendada.

Ahora si la depuraci√≥n de creatinina calculada resulta < de 30 mL/min, la app lo llevara a indicar la anticoagulaci√≥n de la FA del paciente solo con warfarina, haciendo la salvedad que el apixaban se podr√≠a utilizar si depuraci√≥n de creatinina es >  25 mL/min.

En la app tambi√©n hay lista adicional de factores de riesgo de sangrado usados en otros scores de riesgo.

Luego del HAS-BLED, la app lo lleva al valor del CHA2DS2-VASc que c√°lculo y har√° la recomendaci√≥n de anticoagulaci√≥n o no. Para hombres anticoagulaci√≥n oral si CHA2DS2-VASc > 1 y para mujeres si CHA2DS2-VASc > 2. Definida la indicaci√≥n de anticoagulaci√≥n la app lo dirige para que calcule la depuraci√≥n de creatinina por la f√≥rmula de Cockcroft-Gault (Tambi√©n se encuentra dentro de la app). Junto con las evidencias que soportan esta indicaci√≥n. Si el c√°lculo de depuraci√≥n de creatinina es: > 30 mL/min, la app lo llevara a considera el uso de anticoagulantes orales directos (ACOD)[Apixaban, dabigatran o Rivaroxaban]. A preferencia de m√©dico tratante.
Y al hacer click en cualquiera de los ACOD, aparecer√° la informaci√≥n espec√≠fica de la mol√©cula basada en los resultados de su estudio cl√≠nico, y la dosis recomendada.

Ahora si la depuraci√≥n de creatinina calculada resulta < de 30 mL/min, la app lo llevara a indicar la anticoagulaci√≥n de la FA del paciente solo con warfarina, haciendo la salvedad que el apixaban se podr√≠a utilizar si depuraci√≥n de creatinina es > 25 mL/min.
summary: App for use of anticoagulation in patients with atrial fibrillation

title: Talking Ben the Dog
description:
Ben is a retired chemistry professor who likes his quiet comfortable life of eating, drinking and reading newspapers. To make him responsive, you will have to bother him long enough that he will fold his newspaper. Then you can talk to him, poke or tickle him or even have a telephone conversation with him. 

If you get Ben to his laboratory however, he becomes as happy as a puppy. There you can do chemistry experiments by mixing a combination of two test tubes together and see the hilarious reactions. 

HINT: Record a funny video of your telephone conversation with Ben and send it to your friends. 

HOW TO PLAY: 
- Poke Ben's newspaper to make him fold it. 
- Then you can talk to Ben and he will repeat. 
- Poke or slap Ben's face, belly, feet or hands. 
- Tickle Ben's belly. 
- Poke or swipe Ben's graduation picture. 
- Press the phone button and have a conversation with Ben. 
- Record a funny video of your telephone conversation with Ben. 
- Press buttons to make Ben eat, drink or belch. 
- Press the chemistry button to switch Ben to the laboratory. 
- Mix any two test tubes together and see the hilarious chemical reaction. 
- Record videos and share them on YouTube, Facebook or send them to your friends and family by email or MMS.

This app is PRIVO certified. The PRIVO safe harbor seal indicates Outfit7 has established COPPA compliant privacy practices to protect your child‚Äôs personal information. Our apps do not allow younger children to share their information.

This app contains:
- Promotion of Outfit7's products and contextual advertising
- Links that direct customers to our websites and other Outfit7 apps
- Personalization of content to entice users to play the app again
- Watching videos of Outfit7's animated characters via YouTube integration
- The option to make in-app purchases

Terms of use: http://outfit7.com/eula/
Privacy policy: http://outfit7.com/privacy-policy/
